1.name: Centaur Slayer中
1.description: A few more centaur herds are thinned out.

2.name: Teamwork Gets It Done
2.description: Kills that involved at least one profession combo with another player.
2.requirement: Kill enemies using profession combinations with another player.

3.name: Skritt Slayer
3.description: Scrape these scavengers off the surface of Tyria.

4.name: Harpy Slayer
4.description: Clip the wings of these she-beasts.

5.name: Drake Slayer
5.description: Enough of these massive drakes on Tyria's massive plains.

6.name: Spider Slayer
6.description: They should have used their eight legs to run away from tougher fighters.

7.name: Indiscriminate Slayer
7.description: If small things were meant to live, they'd have bigger teeth or faster feet.

8.name: Bandit Slayer
8.description: All criminals eventually meet a dark end.

9.name: Emergency Response Hero
9.description: Always willing to lend a hand, or sword, for the common good. You go where the action is.

10.name: Gold Hoarder
10.description: Money is truly no object for you.
10.requirement: Have coins in the wallet at one time.

11.name: Skillful
11.description: Your range of skills is quite impressive.
11.requirement: Earn hero points by completing hero challenges or by gaining a level with a level 80 character.

12.name: Krytan Explorer
12.description: You've explored the war-torn hills of humanity's home.

bits.text: Harathi Hinterlands: Ruins of Holy Demetra

13.name: Thirst Slayer
13.description: Continuing a valiant battle against dehydration.

15.name: Tinkerer
15.description: Two helms really are better than one.

16.name: Skale Slayer
16.description: It's not polite to eat the dead.

17.name: Staff Master
17.description: A staff has many uses—all deadly.
17.requirement: Deliver killing blows with a staff.

18.name: Sword Master
18.description: A classic weapon that grows more effective in your hand.
18.requirement: Deliver killing blows with a sword.

19.name: Dagger Master
19.description: A slim, elegant blade with so many uses.
19.requirement: Deliver killing blows with a dagger.

20.name: Longbow Master
20.description: Kill 'em before they reach you? Kill 'em before they see you!
20.requirement: Deliver killing blows with a longbow.

21.name: Axe Master
21.description: It's not the prettiest weapon in the armory, but it slices beautifully.
21.requirement: Deliver killing blows with a axe.

22.name: Scepter Master
22.description: Nothing weaves a web of magic like a fine scepter.
22.requirement: Deliver killing blows with a scepter.

23.name: Bat Slayer
23.description: Consider these winged rats cut down.

24.name: Shell Slayer
24.description: Even the creatures in the deep aren't safe from harm.

25.name: Devourer Slayer
25.description: Devourers may be ugly, tough, and dangerous, but they're still prey for a skilled adventurer.

26.name: Dredge Slayer
26.description: Become the enemy of the collective by killing dredge.

27.name: Elemental Slayer
27.description: Fire, earth, lightning, water, and ice can't stand up to steel and magic.

28.name: Ettin Slayer
28.description: Just goes to show: two heads are not better than one.

29.name: Ghost Buster
29.description: Send the spirits into the Mists so they can rest in peace.

30.name: Fish Slayer
30.description: Gut the scaly swimmers to catch an achievement this big.

31.name: Giant Slayer
31.description: The bigger they are, the harder they fall.

32.name: Griffon Slayer
32.description: Hunting these formidable beasts has been a Tyrian pastime for centuries.

33.name: Grawl Slayer
33.description: They should have worshipped you. At least they'd still be alive.

35.name: Flame Legion's Bane
35.description: Smoke out Baelfire's minions, and show them what real power looks like.
35.requirement: Kill members of the Flame Legion.

36.name: Imp Slayer
36.description: Don't worry. Demon blood is easy to wash out.

37.name: Inquest's Bane
37.description: If they are so smart, how come they couldn't stop from getting killed?

39.name: Jotun Slayer
39.description: These creatures used to be powerful and great kings. Now, dead.

40.name: Krait Slayer
40.description: Make it safe to go back in the water.

42.name: Nightmare Court's Bane
42.description: Haunt these evil sylvari like a bad dream.
42.requirement: Kill members of the Nightmare Court.

43.name: Ogre Slayer
43.description: Big and tough are only impressive if you're alive to show it off.

44.name: Ooze Slayer
44.description: Hit them in the right spot and they make cool patterns in the mud.

45.name: Pirate Slayer
45.description: The worst thing to happen to pirates since scurvy and sea monsters.

46.name: Plant Slayer
46.description: These leafy monsters are now mulch.

47.name: Raptor Slayer
47.description: These birds of prey have met their predator.

48.name: Skelk Slayer
48.description: These tricky hunters learned the hard way you were the most dangerous game.

49.name: Sons of Svanir's Bane
49.description: The only good ice dragon cultist is a dead ice dragon cultist.
49.requirement: Kill members of the Sons of Svanir.

50.name: Troll Slayer
50.description: Even trolls can't stand such brutal onslaughts.

51.name: Wind Rider Slayer
51.description: Tangling with you was the last stupid decision these smart creatures ever made.

52.name: Wurm Slayer
52.description: Slice these slimy things from top to bottom.

53.name: Zhaitan's Bane
53.description: Zhaitan should have raised a better army.

54.name: Short-Bow Master
54.description: You deliver pain from a distance.
54.requirement: Deliver killing blows with a short bow.

55.name: Mace Master
55.description: Blunt force trauma is your friend, and you enjoy sharing it with your enemies.
55.requirement: Deliver killing blows with a mace.

56.name: Focus Master
56.description: Only fools see this as an ornament. Only a master knows how to channel magic through it.
56.requirement: Deliver killing blows with a focus.

57.name: Greatsword Master
57.description: You know how to wield a finely crafted piece of forged brutality.
57.requirement: Deliver killing blows with a greatsword.

58.name: Hammer Master
58.description: When you absolutely want to turn your foes into jelly, this is your weapon.
58.requirement: Deliver killing blows with a hammer.

59.name: Warhorn Master
59.description: The sound of death marches upon your enemy.
59.requirement: Deliver killing blows with a warhorn.

60.name: Pistol Master
60.description: You dispense death from the palm of your hand.
60.requirement: Deliver killing blows with a pistol.

61.name: Rifle Master
61.description: You deftly mix precision and power with this two-handed weapon.
61.requirement: Deliver killing blows with a rifle.

62.name: Torch Master
62.requirement: Deliver killing blows with a torch.

63.name: Shield Master
63.description: You know how to turn defense into offense.
63.requirement: Deliver killing blows with a shield.

64.name: Crime and Punishment
64.description: Through valor and a thirst for justice, you earned Logan Thackeray's trust.
64.requirement: Complete the human personal story step "Breaking the Blade," "The Commander," or "The Trial of Julius Zamon."

65.name: Graduation Day
65.description: Your brains and brawn were tested, and you stopped an Inquest plot.
65.requirement: Complete the asura personal story step "Gadd's Last Gizmo," "Defusing the Problem," "Here, There, Everywhere," or "The Things We Do For Love."

66.name: Rising to the Challenge
66.description: Today, you proved your strength by stopping a threat to the lodge.
66.requirement: Complete the norn personal story step "Minotaur Rampant," "The Last of the Giant-Kings," or "The Wolf Havroun."

67.name: For the Legion!
67.description: You brought heat to the Flame Legion.
67.requirement: Complete the charr personal story step "Deadly Force," "Ghostbore Artillery," "Operation: Bulwark," or "Quick and Quiet."

68.name: Waking from the Nightmare
68.description: You were awakened in the Dream and beat back the nightmare threat.
68.requirement: Complete the sylvari personal story step "Beneath a Cold Moon," "Black Night, White Stag," "The Heart of Nightmare," or "The Knight's Duel."

69.name: A Season of Growth
69.description: Some victories are bittersweet, but they're victories nonetheless.
69.requirement: Complete the sylvari personal story step "A Vision of Darkness," "Eye of the Sun," "Shattered Light," or "Snuffing Out Embers."

70.name: Legacy Code
70.description: Your quick thinking and actions stopped an error in your past from causing disaster in the present.
70.requirement: Complete the asura personal story step "Flash Flood," "Magnum Opus," or "Split Second."

71.name: Bloodying the Past
71.description: You have faced down the past, proving once again your might and wits.
71.requirement: Complete the charr personal story step "Dishonorable Discharge," "In the Ruins," "Sins of the Father," "Thicker Than Water," or "Tribunes in Effigy."

72.name: Family Reunion
72.description: You dealt with your past, and now you may join the world moving forward.
72.requirement: Complete the human personal story step "Ashes of the Past," "Liberation," or "The Ringmaster."

73.name: Things Best Left Behind
73.description: You cleaved an embarrassment from your past.
73.requirement: Complete the norn personal story step "Preserving the Balance," "The Championship Fight," or "The Machine in Action."

74.name: Something Lost, Something Gained
74.description: Despite a setback, you find yourself ready to embark on a larger adventure.
74.requirement: Complete the asura personal story step "A Meeting of the Minds," "Lines of Communication," or "Rakt and Ruin."

75.name: From Howl to Silence
75.description: Your honor is restored. However, you must prepare for a greater danger.
75.requirement: Complete the charr personal story step "Ever Vigilant," "Research and Destroy," or "Whispers of Vengeance."

76.name: Storming the Castle
76.description: You saved Queen Jennah from an insidious plot.
76.requirement: Complete the human personal story step "Kellach's Attack," "The Queen's Justice," or "The Trap."

77.name: Brawn over Brains
77.description: You destroyed the Dredge weapon and brought a fellow norn back on the path of destiny.
77.requirement: Complete the norn personal story step "Assault the Hill," "Sever the Head," or "Silent Warfare."

78.name: Branching Out
78.description: You made sure the dead stayed dead.
78.requirement: Complete the sylvari personal story step "A Tangle of Weeds," "Dead of Winter," or "Flower of Death."

79.name: Some Must Fight, That All May Be Free
79.description: You have become a full member of the Vigil.
79.requirement: Complete the story step "Minister's Defense" or "Quaestor's Siege."

80.name: A Friend In Deed
80.description: You came to the aid of another race under threat by the dragons.
80.requirement: Complete the story step "Attempted Deicide," "Evacuation," "Set to Blow," "The Lost Chieftain's Return," or "Unholy Grounds."

81.name: This Far, No Further
81.description: You liberated Claw Island from the undead and swore to strike back at the heart of Orr.

82.name: The Cost of Victory
82.description: You faced your worst fear and emerged triumphant.
82.requirement: Complete the personal story step "A Sad Duty," "Delivering Justice," or "Liberating Apatia."

83.name: Savior of Tyria
83.description: You are counted among the great heroes of Tyria.
83.requirement: Complete the personal story step "Victory or Death."

85.name: Armorsmith
85.requirement: Reach rating in the armorsmithing discipline.

86.name: Artificer
86.requirement: Reach rating in the artificer discipline.

87.name: Chef
87.requirement: Reach rating in the chef discipline.

88.name: Leatherworker
88.requirement: Reach rating in the leatherworker discipline.

89.name: Jeweler
89.requirement: Reach rating in the jeweler discipline.

90.name: Huntsman
90.requirement: Reach rating in the huntsman discipline.

91.name: Tailor
91.requirement: Reach rating in the tailor discipline.

92.name: Weaponsmith
92.requirement: Reach rating in the weaponsmith discipline.

93.name: Asuran Specialty Armors
93.requirement: Soulbind unique piece of asuran cultural armor.

94.name: Charr Specialty Armors
94.description: Fine armor for an exemplary soldier.
94.requirement: Soulbind unique piece of charr cultural armor.

95.name: Human Specialty Armors
95.description: Superior garb in honor of your achievements.
95.requirement: Soulbind unique piece of human cultural armor.

96.name: Norn Specialty Armors
96.requirement: Soulbind unique piece of norn cultural armor.

97.name: Sylvari Specialty Armors
97.description: An exquisitely noble demeanor, cultivated with care.
97.requirement: Soulbind unique piece of sylvari cultural armor.

98.name: To Know the Unknown
98.description: You are now a full member of the Order of Whispers.
98.requirement: Complete the personal story step "An Apple a Day."

99.name: Defending History, Informing the Future
99.description: You are now a full member of the Durmand Priory.
99.requirement: Complete the personal story step "Mightier than the Sword."

100.name: Shiverpeak Explorer
100.description: You've explored the frozen stomping grounds of the legendary norn.
100.requirement: Explore all areas in the Shiverpeaks.

bits.text: Frostgorge Sound: The Sea of Lamentation
Snowden Drifts: Song of Final Exile
Timberline Falls: Tail of the Serpent
Timberline Falls: Lair of the Coil

101.name: Ascalon Explorer
101.description: You've explored the ancestral territory of the charr.

bits.text: Plains of Ashford: Ascalon City Ruins
Plains of Ashford: Old Duke's Estate
Plains of Ashford: Village of Smokestead
Plains of Ashford: The Toppled Wall
Black Citadel: War Wagon Prep Deck
Iron Marches: Sunken Halls of Clarent
Fields of Ruin: Stronghold of Ebonhawke
Fields of Ruin: The Siege Plains
Fields of Ruin: The Ogre Road
Fields of Ruin: Last Stand Shelter
Diessa Plateau: Village of Butcher's Block

102.name: Maguuma Explorer
102.description: You've explored the lush region that cradles the sylvari and provides refuge to the asura.

bits.text: Caledon Forest: Ruins of the Unseen
Rata Sum: Rata Sum Port Authority
The Grove: The Sea Rider's Gate

103.name: Orr Explorer
103.description: You've explored the land once doomed to the ocean by Vizier Khilbron.

bits.text: Straits of Devastation: Shark's Teeth Archipelago
Straits of Devastation: Cathedral of Glorious Victory
Straits of Devastation: Strait of Sacrilege
Straits of Devastation: Half Circle Cove
Straits of Devastation: Strait of Malediction
Straits of Devastation: Sea of Elon
Malchor's Leap: Cathedral of Eternal Radiance
Cursed Shore: Promenade of the Gods
Cursed Shore: Azabe Qabar, the Royal Tombs

104.name: Mist Explorer
104.description: You've explored the battlefields between worlds.
104.requirement: Explore all areas in the battlegrounds of the Mists.

105.name: Legendary Collector
105.description: Owner of some of the rarest items in Tyria.

106.name: Speargun Master
106.description: A mighty hunter cuts through the water.
106.requirement: Deliver killing blows with a speargun.

107.name: Trident Master
107.requirement: Deliver killing blows with a trident.

108.name: Harpoon Master
108.requirement: Deliver killing blows with a harpoon.

111.name: Traveler
111.description: You follow the tradition of a long line of heroes.
111.requirement: Earn points in the Hall of Monuments.

112.name: Guild Warrior
112.description: You follow the tradition of a long line of heroes.
112.requirement: Earn points in the Hall of Monuments.

113.name: Rift Warden
113.description: You follow the tradition of a long line of heroes.
113.requirement: Earn points in the Hall of Monuments.

114.name: Chosen
114.description: You follow the tradition of a long line of heroes.
114.requirement: Earn points in the Hall of Monuments.

115.name: Ascendant
115.description: You follow the tradition of a long line of heroes.
115.requirement: Earn points in the Hall of Monuments.

116.name: Closer to the Stars
116.description: You follow the tradition of a long line of heroes.
116.requirement: Earn points in the Hall of Monuments.

117.name: Ghostly Hero
117.description: You follow the tradition of a long line of heroes.
117.requirement: Earn points in the Hall of Monuments.

118.name: Flameseeker
118.description: You follow the tradition of a long line of heroes.
118.requirement: Earn points in the Hall of Monuments.

119.name: Legend of the Mists
119.description: You follow the tradition of a long line of heroes.
119.requirement: Earn points in the Hall of Monuments.

120.name: Champion of the Gods
120.description: You follow the tradition of a long line of heroes.
120.requirement: Earn points in the Hall of Monuments.

121.name: Dungeons Discovered
121.description: Chasing evil out of the dark places where it hides.

bits.text: The Ruined City of Arah Story

122.name: Dungeon Master
122.description: Mastering the deepest secrets of the darkest corners.

123.name: Hobby Dungeon Explorer
123.description: You return to the depths for adventure's sake.

127.name: Salvage Master
127.description: More interested in what's inside...or just in seeing it fall apart.

128.name: Combat Mechanic
128.description: Never satisfied with the status quo, you upgraded your upgrading activity.

129.name: Agent of Entropy
129.description: The world is composed of certain base elements.

130.name: Hobby Tinkerer
130.description: Changing equipment more often than grawl change gods.

133.name: Active Guild Member
133.description: You are part of the reason why your guild succeeds.

134.name: Local Hero
134.description: A true hero takes time from slaying dragons to help out the common folk as well.

137.name: Been There, Done That
137.description: Seeking Zhaitan's corruption in every corner of Tyria.

139.name: Lifetime Survivor
139.requirement: Gain experience without dying or changing maps.

140.name: Hunter Gatherer
140.description: No stone left unturned. No tree left unpruned.

141.name: God Walking Amongst Mortals
141.requirement: Earn the title "God Walking Amongst Mortals" in Guild Wars.

142.name: Shaman's Rookery
142.description: Prove your might to the four Spirits of the Wild.

145.name: Emerald Sanctum
145.description: Unlock the treasures in the Emerald Sanctum.

146.name: Garnet Sanctum
146.description: Unlock the treasures in the Garnet Sanctum.

148.name: King Jalis's Refuge
148.description: Learn the secret of King Jalis's refuge.

149.name: Loreclaw Expanse
149.description: Discover the secrets of Loreclaw Expanse.

150.name: Sapphire Sanctum
150.description: Unlock the treasures in the Sapphire Sanctum.

152.name: Hint Completion
152.description: An informed adventurer, ready to take on the world.

153.name: Master of Overkill
153.description: Overkill? I don't believe in overkill!
153.requirement: Deliver damage in a single blow.

155.name: Goemm's Lab
155.description: Find the lab in the sky.

158.name: Buried Archives
158.description: Uncover the secrets of the buried archives.

159.name: Spekks's Laboratory
159.description: Survive a trip through Spekks's Laboratory. For science!

160.name: Spelunker's Delve
160.description: Find the way through Spelunker's Delve.

162.name: Twisted Coil
162.description: Survive the depths of the Twisted Coil.

163.name: Conundrum Cubed
163.description: Navigate the strange ruins in Govoran Terraces.

166.name: Keg Interceptions
166.description: Grab those kegs. Block those points.

167.name: Keg Recoveries
167.requirement: Recover fumbles from your own team in Keg Brawl.

170.name: Kegmaster
170.description: 99 kegs of ale on the wall!

171.name: Keg Steals
171.description: Catch fumbled kegs on the fly.
171.requirement: Recover fumbles from the opposing team in keg brawl.

188.name: Sorrow's Subjugator
188.description: The mighty moletariat unites in deed and song!

189.name: Twilight's Idol
189.description: Getting to the root of the problem.

192.name: Eternity's Epitome
192.description: Just how many Subject Alphas are there?

193.name: Griffonrook Run
193.description: Cross the spires of Griffonrook Run.

194.name: Shattered Ice Ruins
194.description: Ascend to the top of the Shattered Ice Ruins.

195.name: Tribulation Rift Scaffolding
195.description: Ascend the ridge atop Tribulation Rift.

196.name: Swashbuckler's Cove
196.description: Survive the onslaught of Swashbuckler's Cove.

197.name: Fawcett's Revenge
197.requirement: Take a one-way trip into Captain Fawcett's pit of death.

198.name: Obsidian Sanctum
198.description: Survive the perils of the Obsidian Sanctum.

199.name: Fawcett's Bounty
199.description: Discover the location of Captain Fawcett's pirate treasure.

200.name: Branded Mine
200.description: Survive the heights of the Branded Mine.

201.name: Pig Iron Quarry
201.description: Braving the leaps at the Pig Iron Quarry.

202.name: Vizier's Tower
202.description: Climb the heights of the Vizier's Tower.

203.name: Professor Portmatt's Lab
203.description: Prove your genius. Or ride on someone's coattails.

205.name: Chaos Crystal Cavern
205.description: Find your way in. Then, find your way out.

206.name: Antre of Adjournment
206.description: Find a way to reach the secret hideout of Arcanist Slizz.

207.name: Only Zuhl
207.description: Plumb the depths of Sector Zuhl.

217.name: Weyandt's Revenge
217.description: Escape the clutches of the mad Captain Weyandt.

218.name: Urmaug's Secret
218.description: Find the way up to the ogre's secret stash.

219.name: Troll's End
219.description: Discover the hidden route to the troll's farm.

220.name: Crash Landing
220.requirement: Find the wrong place to stand during a Claw of Jormag fight.

221.name: Cleaning Up the Neighborhood
221.requirement: Tore down all of the Separatist propaganda posters in one day.

222.name: Speedy Reader
222.description: Broken into twenty volumes for easy reading!
222.requirement: Read the complete history of the founding of Ebonhawke in one day.

223.name: The Emperor's New Wardrobe
223.requirement: Soulbind unique piece of cultural armor.

226.name: Daily Kill Variety
226.requirement: Different families or groups of enemies killed.

231.name: Daily Gatherer
231.description: Fueling the engines of the economy.

234.name: Monthly Successful Events
234.description: A friend and hero to all.

238.name: Monthly Salvage Kit Usages
238.description: Items broken down for parts this month.

239.name: Slayer
239.description: Nothing but corpses in your wake.

240.name: Professional Assassin
240.requirement: Kill enemy player in rated arena games.

241.name: Conqueror
241.description: Win some, lose some; win some more.

248.name: Mercenary
248.description: You aren't a total liability anymore.

249.name: Avenger
249.description: You're making a name for yourself.

250.name: Ransacker
250.description: People want you on their team.

251.name: Marauder
251.description: Enemies pause when they see you coming.

252.name: Ravager
252.description: You strike fear into the hearts of your enemies.

253.name: Reaper
253.description: Enemies lose all hope when they see you.

265.name: Champion Brawler
265.description: Think you're the best? Prove it!

267.name: Magus
267.description: Fire, earth, air, water? All of the above!

268.name: Genius
268.description: No problem your gadgets can't solve!

271.name: Phantom
271.description: Your enemies are shrouded in misery.

272.name: Hunter
272.description: Two heads are better than one.

273.name: Shadow
273.description: Never should have turned their back on you.

275.name: Champion Magus
275.description: Standing on a smoldering pile of your enemies.
275.requirement: Win rated arena game as an elementalist.

276.name: Champion Genius
276.requirement: Win rated arena game as an engineer.

277.name: Champion Paragon
277.requirement: Win rated arena game as a guardian.

278.name: Champion Illusionist
278.requirement: Win rated arena game as a mesmer.

279.name: Champion Phantom
279.description: Walking the line between life and death—your life, their death.
279.requirement: Win rated arena game as a necromancer.

280.name: Champion Hunter
280.requirement: Win rated arena game as a ranger.

281.name: Champion Shadow
281.requirement: Win rated arena game as a thief.

282.name: Champion Legionnaire
282.requirement: Win rated arena game as a warrior.

283.name: Realm Avenger
283.description: You see dead people. A lot!

284.name: Realm Defender
284.description: If you build it, they will die.

285.name: A Pack Dolyak's Best Friend
285.description: Caravans have nothing to fear when you're around.

291.name: Going Camping
291.description: Supply camps crumble under your assaults.

297.name: It's Quite Roomy in Here
297.description: Towers are like a second home to you.

300.name: All We See, We Own
300.description: Can these keeps guard any secrets from you?

303.name: Take Everything in Sight
303.description: Our enemies can only hold out against you for so long.

306.name: Repair Master
306.description: If they damage it, you repair it.

307.name: Master of Disaster
307.description: You can build a trebuchet in your sleep.

310.name: Walls Get in the Way
310.description: Supply camps are impenetrable fortresses with you around.

313.name: Stonemist Stands Firm—Again
313.description: Stonemist is known for breaking armies. You're part of the reason why.

316.name: Nice View From Up Here
316.description: The walls are nearly as tough as you are.

319.name: Stay Out!
319.description: When you say you'll defend something, you really mean it!

322.name: Stopped Them Cold
322.description: Towers are easy to defend once you know how it's done!

336.name: King of the Costume Brawl
336.description: Supremely effective with the most ineffective weapons.

337.name: Dispelling Shadows
337.description: How do you pronounce Aatxe, anyway?
337.requirement: Close the portals opened by the shadow behemoth in less than 20 seconds.

338.name: Don't Feed the Beast
338.description: All he wanted was a snack.
338.requirement: Prevent the great jungle wurm from eating any summoned husks.

339.name: Cleanup Crew
339.description: Fifty percent ogre, fifty percent steam, one hundred percent unexpected.
339.requirement: Find and defeat the misplaced steam ogre in the Thaumanova Reactor.

340.name: Shattered
340.requirement: Break 5 people out of crystal prisons created by the Shatterer.

341.name: Svanir's Bane
341.description: Finish this quickly with a little effort.
341.requirement: Foul the Sons of Svanir plans by destroying the shaman chief and his elemental.

342.name: That Had to Burn
342.description: Good thing we built this megalaser here.
342.requirement: Fire the megalaser at Tequatl the Sunless.

343.name: Kill the Hydra Queen
343.requirement: Find and defeat the hydra queen.

344.name: Forsaken Fortune
344.requirement: Discover the hidden riches of Forsaken Halls.

345.name: Vexa's Lab
345.description: Breach the lab's security. Breach it good.
345.requirement: Find the center of Vexa's Lab.

347.name: Don't Touch the Shiny
347.description: You touched the shiny, didn't you?
347.requirement: Offend the skritt in the Ruins of the Unseen.

348.name: Magellan's Memento
348.requirement: Uncover the riches that doomed Francis Magellan.

349.name: Windy Cave Treasure
349.requirement: Find the treasure of the Windy Cave.

350.name: Ship of Sorrows
350.requirement: Seek lost riches off Orr's shores.

351.name: The Long Way Around
351.description: Fryxx will know if you take the short way around.
351.requirement: Find a way to reach Fryxx.

353.name: Forgotten Stream
353.description: Seriously, who put a door here?
353.requirement: Locate the stream deep beneath Orr.

354.name: Grounded
354.description: It's more of a dirge than an anthem, really.
354.requirement: Recover lost valuables within a beached ship.

356.name: Rebel's Seclusion
356.description: It isn't grave robbing if they fight back, right?

357.name: Bad Neighborhood
357.description: Plug your nose and grab the goods.

358.name: Emissary of the Mad King
358.description: You've made the Mad King proud. He'll kill you last.

359.name: Halloween Events Completed
359.description: The Mad King's events used to knock 'em dead.

361.name: Halloween Huntin'
361.description: How does one stuff a candy corn elemental?
361.requirement: Kill of the Mad King's minions.

362.name: It's a Mad King's World
362.description: Explore the Mad Realm...or die trying.
362.requirement: Explore areas in the Mad Realm.

363.name: Attend the Party
363.description: I hear the jokes are to die for!

364.name: Pumpkin Carving
364.description: Made in the Mad King's own image.
364.requirement: Find pumpkins all around Tyria and carve them.

365.name: Mad King's Clock Tower
365.description: Jump, jump, jump for your life. Fall, fall, fall and you die!

367.name: Hidden Garden
367.description: Unlock the hidden garden's revered treasure.

368.name: Coddler's Cove
368.description: Cuddle the hatchlings of Coddler's Cove!

370.name: Behind the Mask
370.requirement: Get transformed into a raccoon by the Skritt Burglar.

371.name: Jackaloping Along
371.description: Hop a mile in a jackalope's horns.
371.requirement: Get transformed into a jackalope by the Skritt Burglar.

372.name: A Waddle to Remember
372.description: Shake things up as a baby siamoth.
372.requirement: Get transformed into a baby siamoth by the Skritt Burglar.

373.name: Chicken Scramble
373.requirement: Get transformed into a chicken by the Skritt Burglar.

380.name: Fractal Frequenter
380.description: Number of fractals completed in the Fractals of the Mists.

381.name: Volcanic Fractal Stabilizer
381.description: It might be time to get a new pair of shoes.
381.requirement: You've completed the Volcanic fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

382.name: Fractal Frequenter
382.description: You should have asked about a frequent fractal rewards plan.
382.requirement: Number of fractals completed in the Fractals of the Mists.

383.name: Underground Facility Fractal Stabilizer
383.requirement: You've completed the Underground Facility fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

384.name: Solid Ocean Fractal Stabilizer
384.description: Don't forget to ride the wave.
384.requirement: You've completed the Solid Ocean fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

385.name: Swampland Fractal Stabilizer
385.description: Shifting trees won't stop you. The Mossman will.
385.requirement: You've completed the Swampland fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

386.name: Cliffside Fractal Stabilizer
386.requirement: You've completed the Cliffside fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

387.name: Uncategorized Fractal Stabilizer
387.requirement: You've completed the Uncategorized fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

388.name: Snowblind Fractal Stabilizer
388.description: I'm so cold, my frostbite has frostbite.
388.requirement: You've completed the Snowblind fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

389.name: Aquatic Ruins Fractal Stabilizer
389.requirement: You've completed the Aquatic Ruins fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

390.name: Urban Battleground Fractal Stabilizer
390.description: The city is yours! What's left of it anyways.
390.requirement: You've completed the Urban Battleground fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

391.name: The Floor Is Lava. Don't Step In It.
391.description: All those childhood games finally paid off.
391.requirement: You've completed the Volcanic fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists without falling in the lava.

392.name: Carrier Cacophony
392.requirement: You made it through Rabsovich's onslaught without dying while inside the Underground Facility fractal.

393.name: Open Grave
393.requirement: Your party killed all of the monsters in the Solid Ocean fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

394.name: Fancy Footwork
394.description: You can't be caught that easily.
394.requirement: You've made it through the Swampland fractal in the Fractals of the Mists without triggering a single trap.

395.name: Take a Bow
395.requirement: You and the captured colossus of the Cliffside fractal share a moment of respect.

396.name: Hop, Skip, and Jump
396.description: It's all fun and games until someone falls.
396.requirement: You've made it all the way through the Uncategorized fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists without falling to your death.

397.name: If We Only Had Marshmallows
397.requirement: Your team lit every bonfire in Snowblind fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

398.name: Flawless Fins Foil Foes
398.requirement: As a dolphin, you evaded capture by the krait while swimming through the Aquatic Ruins fractal.

399.name: Out of Cluck
399.description: Nothing like roast chicken after a successful siege.
399.requirement: While inside the Urban Battleground fractal, your team killed all the chickens in the city.

400.name: Skipping Stones
400.description: Brave the thermal vents and investigate an ancient shipwreck.

401.name: Under New Management
401.description: Clamber across the Consortium's construction to reach ancient ruins.

402.name: PvP Daily Matches Played
402.description: Win or lose, you see it through to the end.

403.name: PvP Daily Player Kills
403.requirement: Kill, or help kill, an enemy player in a PvP match.

404.name: PvP Daily Captures
404.description: This looks like a nice spot for a picnic.
404.requirement: Help capture a point in a PvP match.

405.name: Daily Top Stats
405.description: There's more than one way to contribute. You find the one that works.
405.requirement: Earn a top scoreboard stat on your team in a PvP match.

406.name: PvP Monthly Wins
406.description: Victory or death... but mostly victory!

407.name: Monthly Kill Variety
407.description: Each profession will find its end with you.

409.name: Monthly Tournament Wins
409.description: Clawing your way to first place, one match at at time.

415.name: Smash the Town
415.description: Nothing a little tape and some glue can't fix.
415.requirement: Destroy every miniature piece of Tixx's toy diorama. (Dungeon instance only; not in the Toypocalypse activity.)

416.name: Sylvari Surprise
416.description: Tixx is opening a new branch.
416.requirement: Help out at Tixx's workshop in the Grove.

417.name: Disaster Derailed
417.requirement: Help out at Tixx's workshop in Divinity's Reach.

418.name: Charitable Charr
418.description: Now with twice the smoke and fire.
418.requirement: Help out at Tixx's workshop in the Black Citadel.

419.name: Help in Hoelbrak
419.requirement: Help out at Tixx's workshop in Hoelbrak.

420.name: Honorary Krewe Member
420.description: You must be this smart to enter.
420.requirement: Help out at Tixx's workshop in Rata Sum.

422.name: Gift Stopper
422.requirement: Stop gift bringers in Snowball Mayhem.

423.name: Ring In the Season
423.requirement: Play the correct notes in Bell Choir Ensemble.

424.name: Become the Bells
424.requirement: Complete songs in Bell Choir Ensemble.

427.name: Apprentice Toymaker
427.description: Getting into the spirit of the season.
427.requirement: Show your seasonal spirt by completing any twelve Wintersday achievements.

428.name: Get on the Good List
428.description: ...and it better not be a lump of coal!
428.requirement: Receive a toy from Tixx himself.

429.name: Cold-Weather Friend
429.description: Remember the carrot and top hat.
429.requirement: Build snowmen with magic snow dispensers hidden all around Tyria.

430.name: Wintersday Cheermeister
430.description: Skritt and melting snowflakes won't stop this present from being on time.
430.requirement: Spread joy atop the frigid heights of Winter Wonderland.

432.name: Toypocalypse Cancelled
432.description: This dolyak WILL make it to deliver the presents today.
432.requirement: Survive Toypocalypse with at least one living gift dolyak.

435.name: Daily Reviver
435.requirement: Revive a downed or defeated NPC or player.

436.name: Daily WvW Caravan Disruptor
436.description: Cut off the enemy supply chain in the Mists.
436.requirement: Destroy enemy supply caravan in World versus World.

437.name: Daily Mists Guard Killer
437.description: You took down the enemy's guards in the Mists.

438.name: Daily WvW Invasion Defender
438.requirement: Defeat enemy invaders in World versus World.

442.name: Daily Mists Defense Restorer
442.description: You repaired your realm's defenses in the Mists.

445.name: Monthly Completionist
445.description: You completed your daily category multiple times in a month.
445.requirement: Complete the daily achievement category times in a month.

446.name: Daily Laurel Vendor
446.requirement: Visit a laurel vendor in any of the major cities.

447.name: Daily Aquatic Slayer
447.requirement: Kill underwater foes that grant experience.

449.name: Daily Veteran Slayer
449.requirement: Kill veteran or elite foes anywhere in Tyria.

450.name: Daily Champion Slayer
450.requirement: Kill champion foes where you find them.

456.name: Daily Exotic Crafter
456.requirement: Craft exotic item from any discipline.

460.name: Refugee Volunteer
460.description: Refugees traveling south from Wayfarer Foothills to Hoelbrak, and from Diessa Plateau to the Black Citadel are in need of assistance. Collect mementos, light campfires, and aid the refugee migration.

461.name: The Gathering Storm
461.description: Invaders are attacking in Wayfarer Foothills and Diessa Plateau. Take them down before they can displace any more refugees!

463.name: Ambient Killer
463.description: Senselessly slaughter helpless ambient Tyrian creatures.

464.name: Ascalonian Ambient Killer
464.description: A little too innocent, if you ask me.
464.requirement: Kill ambient creatures in the following Ascalonian maps: Plains of Ashford, Diessa Plateau, Fields of Ruin, Blazeridge Steppes, Iron Marches, and Fireheart Rise.

465.name: Ascalonian Killer
465.requirement: Kill foes that grant experience in the following Ascalonian maps: Plains of Ashford, Diessa Plateau, Fields of Ruin, Blazeridge Steppes, Iron Marches, and Fireheart Rise.

467.name: Recycler
467.requirement: Break down items using a salvage kit.

469.name: Krytan Killer
469.requirement: Kill foes that grant experience in the following Krytan maps: Queensdale, Kessex Hills, Gendarran Fields, Harathi Hinterlands, Bloodtide Coast, and Southsun Cove.

471.name: Personal Story Completer
471.description: As one story ends, another begins...
471.requirement: Help your allies complete a personal story step, or complete one yourself.

472.name: Costume Brawl Champion
472.description: Emerge as a champion from a costume brawl.

474.name: Maguuman Killer
474.description: The jungle is a dangerous place.
474.requirement: Kill foes that grant experience in the following Maguuma Jungle maps: Caledon Forest, Metrica Province, Brisban Wildlands, Sparkfly Fen, and Mount Maelstrom.

476.name: Shiverpeaks Killer
476.requirement: Kill foes that grant experience in the following Shiverpeak Mountains maps: Wayfarer Foothills, Snowden Drifts, Lornar's Pass, Dredgehaunt Cliffs, Timberline Falls, and Frostgorge Sound.

478.name: Orrian Killer
478.requirement: Kill foes that grant experience in the following Orr maps: Straits of Devastation, Malchor's Leap, and Cursed Shore.

479.name: Story Dungeon Completer
479.requirement: Complete a dungeon on story mode difficulty.

480.name: Ascalonian Veteran Killer
480.requirement: Kill veteran or elite foes in the following Ascalonian maps: Plains of Ashford, Diessa Plateau, Fields of Ruin, Blazeridge Steppes, Iron Marches, and Fireheart Rise.

481.name: Dungeon Completer
481.requirement: Complete a dungeon on explorable mode difficulty.

484.name: Maguuman Veteran Killer
484.requirement: Kill veteran or elite foes in the following Maguuma Jungle maps: Caledon Forest, Metrica Province, Brisban Wildlands, Sparkfly Fen, and Mount Maelstrom.

485.name: Keg Brawl Fumble Forcer
485.requirement: Knock an opponent's keg loose during the Hoelbrak keg brawl.

486.name: Shiverpeaks Veteran Killer
486.requirement: Kill veteran or elite foes in the following Shiverpeak Mountains maps: Wayfarer Foothills, Snowden Drifts, Lornar's Pass, Dredgehaunt Cliffs, Timberline Falls, and Frostgorge Sound.

489.name: Keg Brawl Scorer
489.description: Dunk it, shoot it, score it.
489.requirement: Return a keg to your keg master in the Hoelbrak keg brawl.

491.name: Keg Brawl Stealer
491.description: Step one: cause fumble. Step two: catch fumble.
491.requirement: Catch a fumbled keg out of the air in the Hoelbrak keg brawl.

492.name: Keg Brawl Victor
492.requirement: Defeat your opposing team in the Hoelbrak keg brawl.

493.name: Skill Interrupter
493.requirement: Successfully interrupt a foe's skills by dazing, causing fear, knocking down, launching, pulling, pushing, or stunning your foe.

495.name: Condition Applier
495.requirement: Apply bleeding, blinding, burning, chilling, confusion, crippling, fear, immobilization, poison, vulnerability, or weakness to your foes.

496.name: Condition Remover
496.requirement: Remove bleeding, blinding, burning, chill, confusion, crippling, fear, immobilization, poison, vulnerability, or weakness from yourself or your allies.

500.name: Daily Mystic Forger
500.requirement: Use the Mystic Forge in the Mystic Plaza in Lion's Arch to create new items.

501.name: Hero Point Accumulator
501.requirement: Acquire hero points from hero challenges or by leveling a character that is already level 80.

502.name: Leveler
502.requirement: Gain a level. Also applies to level 80 characters.

503.name: Ascalonian Event Completer
503.description: There's always something going on in Ascalon.
503.requirement: Complete events in the following Ascalonian maps: Plains of Ashford, Diessa Plateau, Fields of Ruin, Blazeridge Steppes, Iron Marches, and Fireheart Rise.

504.name: Krytan Event Completer
504.requirement: Complete events in the following Krytan maps: Queensdale, Kessex Hills, Gendarran Fields, Harathi Hinterlands, Bloodtide Coast, and Southsun Cove.

505.name: Maguuman Event Completer
505.requirement: Complete events in the following Maguuma Jungle maps: Caledon Forest, Metrica Province, Brisban Wildlands, Sparkfly Fen, and Mount Maelstrom.

506.name: Shiverpeaks Event Completer
506.requirement: Complete events in the following Shiverpeak Mountains maps: Wayfarer Foothills, Snowden Drifts, Lornar's Pass, Dredgehaunt Cliffs, Timberline Falls, and Frostgorge Sound.

509.name: Event Mentor
509.requirement: Complete events while adjusted below your actual character level.

512.name: Monthly Masterwork Crafter
512.requirement: Craft items of masterwork quality or higher.

514.name: Monthly Completionist
514.requirement: You completed your daily category multiple times in a month.

516.name: Champion Slayer
516.description: Defeat champion foes where you find them.

517.name: Veteran Slayer
517.description: Defeat veteran or elite foes anywhere in Tyria.

518.name: Hero Point Amasser
518.requirement: Acquire hero points from hero challenges or by leveling with a character already at level 80.

519.name: Monthly Group Event Completer
519.description: Overcome challenging group events through teamwork.

520.name: Monthly Successful Events
520.description: A friend and hero to all.

536.name: Lost and Found
536.description: Refugees in Lion's Arch lost many things on the journey to the city. Returning their belongings may encourage them to discuss the events that drove them from their homes.

537.name: Secret Contact
537.description: Agent Brandubh is trying to find and translate dead-drop messages from his partner, who is undercover in the dredge-Flame Legion alliance. Get a cryptotranslator from Agent Brandubh. It will help locate the dead drops across Diessa Plateau and Wayfarer Foothills and then decrypt them for you.
537.requirement: Use the Order Cryptotranslator to decrypt dead drops.

539.name: Rox: Critical Mission
539.description: Rytlock Brimstone meets Rox in the Imperator's Core, where the defense quorum is debating. He assigns her a mission for which she will need support.

540.name: Rox - The Hatchery
540.description: Rox has orders from Rytlock to secure assets at the devourer hatchery northwest of the town of Nolan in Diessa Plateau. She would appreciate your support.

541.name: Braham: Help from the Legions
541.description: Braham, a young norn claiming to be Eir Stegalkin's son, visits Rytlock Brimstone in his Black Citadel office and requests troop support to defend his homestead.

542.name: Braham - Retake Cragstead
542.description: Having received no support from Rytlock or Eir, Braham enlists your help to retake Cragstead, in the Wayfarer Foothills, from the Molten Alliance.

543.name: Braham - Eirsson
543.description: Given Tribune Brimstone's refusal, Braham has no choice but to go to Hoelbrak and ask Knut Whitebear to send Wolfborn to help defend his homestead.
543.requirement: Witness Braham's meeting with Knut Whitebear.

544.name: Hero's Aid
544.description: You bravely assisted Rox and Braham, two burgeoning heroes of Tyria.
544.requirement: Successfully complete all of the Rox and Braham Living Story instances.

545.name: Spy on This!
545.description: The Flame Legion and dredge will regret trying to eavesdrop on you! Recover and turn in audio logs from sonic periscopes in Wayfarer Foothills, Snowden Drifts, Plains of Ashford, Diessa Plateau, and Iron Marches.
545.requirement: Recover audio logs from sonic periscopes.

546.name: Scholar
546.requirement: Complete Zone 1, Zone 2, and Zone 3 in World 1.

547.name: Minor in Enhancement
547.requirement: Obtain all of the item upgrades found in World 1.

548.name: Bachelor of Pioneering
548.description: Left, left, left, left...wait a minute.
548.requirement: Find the shortcut located in World 1, Zone 2.

550.name: Minor in Fortitude
550.description: No time to take damage, a super adventure awaits!
550.requirement: Complete any zone without using a health potion or dying.

552.name: Associate of Secrets, World 1
552.requirement: Find all of the hidden rooms (excluding furniture shops) in World 1, Zone 1.

bits.text: The mountain has a back door.

553.name: Bachelor of Secrets, World 1
553.requirement: Find all of the hidden rooms (excluding furniture shops) in World 1, Zone 2.

554.name: Master of Secrets, World 1
554.requirement: Find all of the hidden rooms (excluding furniture shops) in World 1, Zone 3.

555.name: Doctor of Secrets, World 1
555.description: That's Doctor of Secrets to you!
555.requirement: Find all of the hidden rooms (excluding furniture shops) located in World 1.

556.name: Associate of Baubles, World 1
556.requirement: Collect all of the baubles in World 1, Zone 1 in one playthrough. Baubles from foes aren't counted.

557.name: Bachelor of Baubles, World 1
557.requirement: Collect all of the baubles in World 1, Zone 2 in one playthrough. Baubles from foes aren't counted.

558.name: Master of Baubles, World 1
558.requirement: Collect all of the baubles in World 1, Zone 3 in one playthrough. Baubles from foes aren't counted.

559.name: Doctor of Baubles, World 1
559.requirement: Collect all of the baubles in World 1. Baubles from foes aren't counted.

560.name: Minor in Elusion
560.requirement: Complete World 1, Zone 3 without getting caught by sticky plants or flytraps.

562.name: Baby's First Super Adventure
562.requirement: Play Zone 1, Zone 2, and Zone 3 in World 1 in Infantile Mode.

bits.text: Complete World 1, Zone 1 on Infantile Mode.
Complete World 1, Zone 2 on Infantile Mode.
Complete World 1, Zone 3 on Infantile Mode.

563.name: Glutton for Punishment
563.requirement: Complete Zone 1, Zone 2, and Zone 3 in World 1 in Tribulation Mode.

566.name: PvP Monthly Wins
566.description: Victory or death... but mostly victory!

567.name: Monthly PvP Completionist
567.description: You completed your PvP daily category multiple times in a month.
567.requirement: Complete the PvP daily category time.

569.name: Rage Against the War Machine
569.requirement: Destroy a Molten Alliance weapons facility in Wayfarer Foothills or Diessa Plateau.

570.name: Avenger of the Dispossessed
570.description: Once the Molten menace was eliminated, your allies returned home for closure. According to reports, Rox is visiting the jail in Black Citadel, and Braham is heading to Knut Whitebear's loft.
570.requirement: Followed Up with Rox and Braham

571.name: Alliance Breaker
571.requirement: Complete the following achievements for Flame and Frost: Volunteer, Lost and Found, the Gathering Storm, Secret Contact, and Avenger of the Dispossessed.

572.name: A Rallying Flame
572.requirement: Commemorate the completion of the Flame and Frost story arc in Lion's Arch, Hoelbrak, or the Black Citadel.

580.name: Daily Tournament Matches Won
580.description: Clawing your way to first place, one match at at time.

581.name: Daily Unique Maps Played
581.requirement: Complete a match on a number of different PvP maps.

589.name: Southsun Volunteer Fieldwork
589.description: Assist Researcher Levvi by collecting samples around Southsun Cove.

590.name: Southsun Cave Sample Collection
590.description: Collect a sample from the tidal caves north of Sawtooth Bay.

591.name: Southsun Elevation Sample Collection
591.description: Collect a sample from the highest point on Southsun Cove.

592.name: Southsun Lava Sample Collection
592.description: Collect a sample from the lava pool in the Karka Hive.

593.name: Southsun Geyser Sample Collection
593.description: Collect a sample from a geyser on the north end of Driftglass Springs.

594.name: Southsun Islet Sample Collection
594.description: Collect a sample from the islet across Southsun Strait.

595.name: Southsun Vent Sample Collection
595.description: Collect a sample from the steam vents along Southsun Shoals.

596.name: Southsun Shipwreck Sample Collection
596.description: Collect a sample from a shipwreck on the east end of Southsun Shoals.

597.name: Southsun Camp Sample Collection
597.description: Collect a sample near Levvi's research camp at Canach's Folly.

598.name: Southsun Pool Sample Collection
598.description: Collect a sample from the geothermal pools at Driftglass Springs.

599.name: Southsun River Sample Collection
599.description: Collect a sample from the river to the west of Driftglass Springs.

600.name: Southsun Sandpit Sample Collection
600.description: Collect a sample from the sand wurm pits in Onyx Field.

602.name: Consortium Rewards Club Member
602.description: Complete Southsun events while affiliated with the Consortium.

603.name: Southsun Settler Supporter
603.description: Complete Southsun events while affiliated with the settlers.

604.name: Canach Trapper
604.description: Defeat the fugitive Canach in his Southsun lair.

605.name: Subdirector NULL Demolitionist
605.description: Defeat Canach's golem, Subdirector NULL, in Canach's Lair.

606.name: Lair Light-foot
606.description: Complete Canach's Lair without getting caught in any traps.

607.name: Southsun VIP Meet and Greet
607.description: Speak with key Southsun Cove characters.

608.name: Gossip with Lord Faren
608.description: Speak with Lord Faren on Southsun Cove.

609.name: Gossip with Lady Kasmeer
609.description: Speak with Lady Kasmeer Meade on Southsun Cove.

610.name: Consultation with Researcher Levvi
610.description: Speak with Researcher Levvi on Southsun Cove.

611.name: Briefing by Inspector Kiel
611.description: Speak with Inspector Kiel on Southsun Cove.

612.name: Confer with Subdirector Noll
612.description: Speak with Subdirector Noll on Southsun Cove.

613.name: Contractually Obligated
613.description: Helped load Southsun contracts onto the transport ship for safekeeping.

614.name: The Goggles Do Nothing
614.description: Put on the diving goggles and dive into a Southsun lava pool.

615.name: Southsun Sightseer
615.description: Visit all the settlements of Southsun Cove.

616.name: Southsun Omelette Gourmand
616.description: Eat an omelette cooked by castaway chef Owain.

617.name: Crazed Karka Queen Killer
617.description: Defeat a crazed karka queen on Southsun Cove.

619.name: Crab Toss Participant
619.description: Join in the Southsun Crab Toss.

620.name: Southsun Skinny Dipper
620.description: Swim off the coast of the Pearl Island resort beach on Southsun Cove without your armor.

621.name: Crabtacular!
621.description: Be the last player standing while holding the crab in the Southsun Crab Toss.

622.name: Crabgrabber
622.description: Steal and deny the crab from other players in the Southsun Crab Toss.

623.name: Crab-Carrying Competitor
623.description: Carry the crab in the Southsun Crab Toss.

624.name: Southsun Stalwart
624.description: Successfully complete all of the Southsun achievements.

643.name: Daily WvW Land Claimer
643.requirement: Claim land for your realm in World versus World.

644.name: Daily WvW Camp Capturer
644.requirement: Capture supply camps for your realm in World versus World.

645.name: Daily WvW Tower Capturer
645.requirement: Capture towers for your realm in World versus World.

646.name: Daily WvW World Ranker
646.requirement: Gain World Rank in World versus World.

647.name: Champion of Champions
647.description: Win 150 rated arena matches as each of the eight professions.

649.name: The Dragon Bash Experience
649.requirement: You've gotten into the swing of Dragon Bash.

650.name: Zhaitasty
650.requirement: You've sampled—indulged in, really—the official candy of Dragon Bash.

651.name: Burn Down The Dragons
651.requirement: Took part in the new Dragon Bash tradition of the immolation of dragon effigies.

652.name: Color the Sky
652.requirement: You painted the sky with some Tyrian pyrotechnics.

653.name: Paper Dragon
653.requirement: You've broken open a legion of dragon piñatas and feasted on the yummy treats inside.

654.name: So Lifelike
654.requirement: You've vanquished legions of holographic minions during Dragon Bash.

655.name: Meet the Hosts
655.requirement: Talk to each of the Lion's Arch Ship's Council and learn about Dragon Bash.

656.name: Winner's Circle
656.requirement: You've picked the winner in a number of moa races.

657.name: Dragon Ball Devotee
657.requirement: You're a veteran of the Dragon Ball arena.

658.name: Dragon Ball Boss
658.requirement: Count yourself among the elite of the Dragon Ball.

661.name: The Big Boom in the Big City
661.requirement: The Ship's Council presents a stunning firework display as part of the inaugural Dragon Bash celebrations.

662.name: Case Closed
662.requirement: You solved the mystery. The good people of Lion's Arch can breathe easier now.

663.name: Hard Boiled
663.requirement: Track down and talk to Marjory at The Dead End in Divinity's Reach.

664.name: Ceremony and Acrimony
664.requirement: Get the wounded Ship's Council members to safety.

665.name: Every Piece Matters
665.requirement: Find all the missing suspects in the world. Talk to Marjory at the Lion's Arch crime scene for more details.

666.name: No More Secrets

bits.text: Drive the Sons of Svanir from Coiled Watch.
Escort the explosives-laden dolyaks to the Barrowstead.
Destroy the totem foci to stop the Svanir corruption ritual.

1680.requirement: Capture and defend Coiled Watch in Frostgorge Sound without any casualties.

1693.requirement: Find the legendary llama hidden in Challenger Cliffs.

1694.requirement: Find all of the lost coins hidden around Challenger Cliffs.

1696.requirement: Prevented skritts from raiding supplies from Zephyrites in Challenger Cliffs.

1701.name: Power Squelcher
1701.requirement: Defeat the Mordrem leyleecher after it's reached full power.

1702.name: Mischief Maker
1702.requirement: Urge Taimi to yell at Braham during the recalibration device demonstration.

1704.name: Sneaky Sleuth
1704.requirement: Complete the party investigation without arousing any suspicion.

1706.requirement: Complete the party investigation at the maximum amount of suspicion without being thrown out.

1712.requirement: Unlock all fractal weapon skins in your wardrobe.

1725.requirement: Use Ascalonian Tears from the Ascalonian Catacombs to unlock all weapon and armor skins in your wardrobe.

1728.name: Fine Wining
1728.locked_text: Purchase a Vintner's Guide from Gastronom Plikk in Rata Sum.

1729.name: Utility Utilizer
1729.requirement: Use one of each of these utility boost items.

1730.name: Trash Collector
1730.description: <c=@flavor>There must be something valuable in all this junk...</c>
1730.requirement: Collect these junk items throughout Tyria.

1731.name: Exotic Attire
1731.requirement: Unlock these crafted exotic armor skins in your wardrobe.

1732.name: Chaos Weapon Collection
1732.description: <c=@flavor>These weapons are made of pure chaotic energy. Proper hand protection is recommended.</c>
1732.requirement: Unlock all Chaos weapon skins in your wardrobe.

1733.name: Sclerite Weapon Collection
1733.description: <c=@flavor>Keep the spirit of the Southsun Cove vacation frame of mind going all year round!</c>
1733.requirement: Unlock all Sclerite weapon skins in your wardrobe.

1734.requirement: Unlock these crafted ascended armor skins in your wardrobe.

1735.requirement: Unlock all Tormented weapon skins in your wardrobe.

1736.description:
<c=@flavor>"Give solace and shelter to those who need it. Be ye a salve to the wounded."</c>
—Scriptures of Dwayna, 115 BE
1736.requirement: Prove your piety by collecting all of the vestments of Dwayna.

1737.name: Aetherized Weapon Collection
1737.description: <c=@flavor>Join your sky pirate brothers and sisters in spirit by unlocking all the aetherized weapon skins.</c>
1737.requirement: Unlock all Aetherized weapon skins in your wardrobe.

1738.name: Dragon's Jade Weapon Collection
1738.description: <c=@flavor>Who knew bashing dragons could be so fun?</c>
1738.requirement: Unlock all Dragon's Jade weapon skins in your wardrobe.

1739.name: Dreamthistle Weapon Collection
1739.description: <c=@flavor>Pay tribute to your fallen comrades that were involved in bringing down the Nightmare Tower.</c>
1739.requirement: Unlock all Dreamthistle weapon skins in your wardrobe.

1740.name: Fused Weapon Collection
1740.description: <c=@flavor>Collect all of the Fused weapon skins to show off your wild side.</c>
1740.requirement: Unlock all Fused weapon skins in your wardrobe.

1741.name: Ley Line Weapon Collection
1741.description: <c=@flavor>Don't get TOO caught up in the magic of Ley Lines. It could get painful—just ask Drooburt.</c>
1741.requirement: Unlock all Ley Line weapon skins in your wardrobe.

1742.name: Lovestruck Weapon Collection
1742.description:
<c=@flavor>"Keep your heart on your sleeve—or blade. Either way hurts when I am angered."
– Lord Faren</c>
1742.requirement: Unlock all Lovestruck weapon skins in your wardrobe.

1743.name: Phoenix Weapon Collection
1743.description: <c=@flavor>Show off your fiery side with this collection!</c>
1743.requirement: Unlock all Phoenix weapon skins in your wardrobe.

1744.name: Jormag Defense Guide
1744.requirement: Unlock all of the corrupted weapons in your wardrobe, and collect various Jormag related items.
1744.locked_text: Loot Jormag's Claw Fragment from the Claw of Jormag in Frostgorge Sound.

1745.description: <c=@flavor>You never know what you can learn from someone who's been around longer than you have.</c>

1745.locked_text: Loot a Grawl Paw from grawl throughout Tyria.

1746.name: Winter's Weapon Collection
1746.description: <c=@flavor>Show your celebratory Wintersday side all year around!</c>
1746.requirement: Unlock all Winter's weapon skins in your wardrobe.

1747.name: Zodiac Weapon Collection
1747.description: <c=@flavor>Will you unlock the mystery of the stars after collecting all these skins? Only one way to find out.</c>

1748.name: Exotic Hunter

1749.name: Ambrite Weapon Collection
1749.description: <c=@flavor>Gentt would be so proud of you.</c>

1751.name: Rare Regalia
1751.requirement: Unlock all crafted rare armor skins in your wardrobe.

1752.description: <c=@flavor>May the spirits of the past protect me now and forever.</c>

1761.requirement: Unlock all Tempest weapon skins in your wardrobe.

2146.requirement: Discover this Maguuma Mastery Insight in Verdant Brink.

2147.name: Verdant Brink Insight: Creaking Cavern
2147.requirement: Discover this Maguuma Mastery Insight in Verdant Brink.

2148.name: Verdant Brink Insight: Outside Noble Ledges
2148.requirement: Discover this Maguuma Mastery Insight in Verdant Brink.

2149.name: Verdant Brink Insight: Creeping Crevasse
2149.requirement: Discover this Maguuma Mastery Insight in Verdant Brink.

2150.name: Verdant Brink Insight: Heartless Pass
2150.requirement: Discover this Maguuma Mastery Insight in Verdant Brink.

2153.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 11
2153.requirement: Complete scale 11 fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

2154.name: A Stomping Good Time
2154.requirement: Use 20 Scarecrow or Mad King stomps against players in PvP or WvW.

2155.name: Honorary Rata Novan
2155.description: You became the Citizen of Tomorrow, today!
2155.requirement: Participate in every stage of building Rata Novus back up.

2156.name: Master of the Molten Ore
2156.requirement: Only use four buckets during the boss encounter of the Underground Facility fractal.

2157.name: Tendril Torchers: Gold
2157.requirement: Burn tendrils and avoid unexploded shot before time runs out!

2158.name: Volcano Hero
2158.requirement: Defeat the Imbued Shaman on scale 51 or above without losing any captives.

2160.name: Pact Pilot Protector
2160.requirement: Help the captured Pact pilots escape from Toadstool Mire.

2161.name: Candy Corn Crusher
2161.requirement: Defeat the Grand High Viscount of Candy Corn in Mad King's Labyrinth.

2162.name: Daily Revenant or Ranger Winner
2162.requirement: Win PvP match as a revenant or ranger.

2163.name: Adept Berserker
2163.requirement: Begin training the warrior's berserker elite specialization.

2164.name: Auric Basin Insight: Southwatch Creep
2164.requirement: Discover Insights of Maguuma Mastery in Auric Basin.

2165.name: Raised the Bar
2165.requirement: Participate in raising the security level at night while fully eligible.

2166.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 29
2166.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

2167.name: New Afterlife for Quaggan
2167.requirement: Donate enough pieces of candy corn to give Drooburt a new start.

2168.name: Auric Basin Insight: Masks of the Fallen
2168.requirement: Discover Insights of Maguuma Mastery in Auric Basin.

2169.name: Crimson Wurmslayer
2169.requirement: Kill the crimson head of the great jungle wurm in Bloodtide Coast.

2171.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 40
2171.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

2172.name: Cloak and Snagger
2172.description: You've stealthily glided past the Mordrem snipers and stolen their supplies!
2172.requirement: Bypass the Mordrem snipers using stealth gliding and steal their supplies!

2173.name: The Ley-Line Run: Gold
2173.requirement: Zap your way through the checkpoints and across the finish line!

2174.name: Totems of the Itzel
2174.requirement: Help the high priest recover the totems of the Jaaka Itzel tribe that are scattered throughout the surrounding jungle after the last Mordrem Guard attack.

2175.name: Dragon Bombardier
2175.description: That should shut that mouth for now.
2175.requirement: Grab an unstable mortar shell from a crashed chopper and drop it on the Mouth of Mordremoth.

2176.name: An Ignoble End
2176.requirement: Find and question the wounded Mordrem Guard on the outskirts of Rata Novus.

2177.name: The Moot I: The Experimental Mace
2177.description: First comes the hunt—the matching of martial prowess against the bestial cunning. Mighty creatures roam the land, and as you stalk them, consider their place, in these initial steps to creating the legendary precursor known as The Energizer. Hurry! Before someone gets eaten!
2177.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

2178.name: In Their Footsteps
2178.requirement: Complete the In Their Footsteps story mission.

2179.name: Revenant: Salvation
2179.requirement: Complete the Salvation revenant specialization to unlock the Mistward Plate collection.

2180.name: Rodgort I: The Experimental Torch
2180.description: Fire is the most volatile and energetic of the elements. Consign the parts of magical beasts to the flames, and meditate on the flames that result, as you begin your journey to attain the legendary precursor known as Rodgort's Flame.
2180.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

2181.name: Revered
2181.description: I call upon the Mists to destroy my enemies!

2182.name: Adept Reaper
2182.requirement: Begin training the necromancer's reaper elite specialization.

2183.name: Twilight III: Dusk
2183.description: It is always darkest before the dawn, and within that gloom lies great potential and power. Use your crafted Gloominator to pull the gloom from the land in your journey to create the legendary precursor Dusk.

2184.name: Twilight II: The Perfected Nightsword
2184.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor Dusk has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

2185.name: Rally to Maguuma
2185.requirement: Complete the Rally to Maguuma story mission.

2186.name: Triple Mordrem Takedown
2186.description: Mowing down Mordrem like a boss.
2186.requirement: Kill all three possible Mordrem champions in Dragon's Passage.

2187.name: The Bifrost III: The Legend
2187.description: Light shines upon the world, creating the colors around us. Study and create the color palette of the world using artistry and light. Channel this rainbow into your efforts to craft the legendary precursor The Legend.

2188.name: A Fungus Among Us: Silver
2188.requirement: Bounce your way through the checkpoints and across the finish line!

2189.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 21
2189.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

2190.name: Leystone Armor
2190.requirement: Unlock all leystone armor skins in your wardrobe.

2191.name: Daily Fractal Adept
2191.requirement: Complete different scale 1–20 fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

2192.name: Machined Shield
2192.requirement: Collect all items to forge your Machined Shield.

2193.name: Kudzu I: The Experimental Longbow
2193.description: Through flood, fire, and famine, the power of the plants survive. The story of its resilience and quiet power can be found in every root and stem, in every petal and leaf. Meditate on the power of such things as you begin your journey to create the legendary precursor, Leaf of Kudzu.
2193.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

2194.name: Vinetooth Hunter
2194.description: There's a predator lurking in the jungle, chasing anything that isn't Mordrem.
2194.requirement: Find and defeat Vinetooth Prime in its lair.

2195.name: Deathless Escape
2195.requirement: While being pursued by the Mordrem beast, do not die.

2196.name: Sylvari Solidarity
2196.description: Story Mission: Torn from the Sky
2196.requirement: Help a sylvari resist Mordremoth's call.

2197.name: Flights of Fancy
2197.requirement: Avoid getting hit during all forced-flight sections of the final encounter. Entering a protective shield negates qualification.

2198.name: Blademaster Diarmid Slayer
2198.description: Another Mordrem commander cut down in her prime.
2198.requirement: Kill Blademaster Diarmid during the fight against the Mouth of Mordremoth.

2200.name: Fallen Masks: Silver
2200.requirement: Soothe the tormented spirits of fallen Exalted.

2201.name: Prisoners of the Dragon
2201.description: Journal: Prisoners of the Dragon Completed
2201.requirement: Complete the Prisoners of the Dragon story mission.

2202.name: Karka Queen Killer
2202.requirement: Defeat a legendary karka queen on Southsun Cove.

2204.name: Auric Basin Insight: Jawatl Grounds
2204.requirement: Discover Insights of Maguuma Mastery in Auric Basin.

2205.name: Mushroom Conservationist
2205.requirement: Help Taimi collect saurian bones without using more than 4 mushrooms.

2206.name: Going Berserk
2206.requirement: Defeat the Molten Berserker before defeating the Molten Firestorm in the first phase of the encounter, then defeat the upgraded Molten Firestorm in the second phase of the encounter in the Molten Boss fractal.

2207.name: Disco Dancing Delver
2207.description: You got your groove on in the disco cave!
2207.requirement: Dance in the secret disco cave.

2209.name: Death to the Undying
2209.requirement: Defeat the Skeletal Lich in Mad King's Labyrinth.

2210.name: "Shard of Brilliance" Strongbox
2210.requirement: Search in the Tangled Descent area for the strongbox from the "Shard of Brilliance."

2211.name: Sky Stalker
2211.requirement: Defeat Axemaster Gwyllion after nightfall in Verdant Brink.

2212.name: Dragon's Stand Explorer
2212.requirement: Explore all areas in Dragon's Stand.

2213.name: The Minstrel II: The Perfected Focus
2213.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor The Bard has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

2214.name: "Pride of Lion's Arch" Strongbox
2214.requirement: Search in the Prismatic Postpile area for the strongbox from the "Pride of Lion's Arch."

2215.name: Drone Race: Silver
2215.requirement: Boost and blast your way through the checkpoints and across the finish line!

2216.name: Hidden Amphibian
2216.description: All he wanted was a break...
2216.requirement: Defeat the irritable Itzel who's hiding out and whittling in his favorite spot.

2217.name: Fractal Expert
2217.requirement: Complete each fractal scale from 51 to 75.

2218.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 9
2218.requirement: Complete scale 9 fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

2219.name: Artful Dodger
2219.description: Story Instance: Prisoners of the Dragon
2219.requirement: When ascending the narrow path off the plateau, destroy all the Mordrem tendrils without being hit by their poison area attacks.

2220.name: Horologicus
2220.requirement: Collect these items and skins to receive the chronomancer's shield, Horologicus.
2220.locked_text: Begin training the mesmer's chronomancer elite specialization.

2221.name: Yggdrasil
2221.requirement: Collect these items and skins to receive the druid's staff, Yggdrasil.
2221.locked_text: Begin training the ranger's druid elite specialization.

2222.name: Verdant Brink Explorer
2222.requirement: Explore all areas in Verdant Brink.

2223.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 26
2223.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

2224.name: Stavemaster Adryn Slayer
2224.description: Another Mordrem commander cut down in his prime.
2224.requirement: Kill Stavemaster Adryn during the fight against the Mouth of Mordremoth.

2225.name: No More Time
2225.requirement: Complete the trial of wits without gaining any bonus time.

2226.name: Core-Fractal Hero
2226.requirement: Complete each fractal scale from 21 to 50.

2227.name: Agent's Pack
2227.requirement: Collect all items to create your Agent's Pack.
2227.locked_text: On first completion of the story step "Prisoners of the Dragon," choose one of the three order-themed backpacks.

2229.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 6
2229.requirement: Complete scale 6 fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

2230.name: Scrap Rifle Field Test: Silver
2230.requirement: Kill as many chak as you can before the timer runs out, but be careful—your scrap rifle is prone to overheating! Destroying chak eggs will release a goo that will heal you and cool your rifle if you are close by, but it's likely to stir up the chak.

2231.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 13
2231.requirement: Complete scale 13 fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

2232.name: Frenzy II: The Perfected Harpoon Gun
2232.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor Rage has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

2233.name: Chak Egg Scrambler
2233.description: This is sure to egg the chak on!
2233.requirement: Destroy all of the chak eggs in the scrap cannon adventure in one attempt.

2234.name: Zinn's Prize Student
2234.requirement: Collect all books to compile Zinn's Study Guide.

2235.name: Machined Torch
2235.requirement: Collect all items to forge your Machined Torch.

2237.name: Regurgicidal
2237.requirement: Defeat the great skelk regurgitant in Tangled Depths.

2238.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 15
2238.requirement: Complete scale 15 fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

2239.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 27
2239.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

2240.name: "Vengeance Rising" Strongbox
2240.requirement: Search in the Eastwatch Bluff area for the strongbox from the "Vengeance Rising."

2241.name: The Juggernaut II: The Perfected Hammer
2241.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor The Colossus has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

2242.name: The Minstrel III: The Bard
2242.description: From the forge of criticism emerges the glory of performance, where one learns of the vast wonder of the world of music. Tyria is alive with music if one only takes the time to focus upon it. Gather these songs in your journey to create the legendary precursor The Bard.

2243.name: "Unsolved Conundrum" Strongbox
2243.requirement: Search in the Broken Altar area for the strongbox from the "Unsolved Conundrum."

2244.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 33
2244.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

2245.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 24
2245.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

2246.name: Equitable Elector
2246.description: If you want something done right...
2246.requirement: Participate in the election of all 3 potential Pact leaders.

2248.name: Follows Advice
2248.description: Unlocks additional daily achievements for fractal scales 21–49.
2248.requirement: Complete the Follows Advice tier of the Fractal Attunement Mastery.

2249.name: "Glory of Tyria" Strongbox
2249.requirement: Search in the Noble Ledges area for the strongbox from the "Glory of Tyria."

2250.name: HOPE IV: The Catalyst
2250.description: Let magical energy and alchemical potions combine as you bring the energies of asura and hylek together to create and charge a more perfect weapon, gaining the Gift of the Catalyst, the penultimate step in your journey to gain HOPE, the legendary pistol.

2252.name: On Wings of Gold: Silver
2252.requirement: Deliver collected shield anomalies by gliding near the collection device.

2253.name: Sunrise I: The Experimental Daysword
2253.description: Tyria is a land filled with peoples worth protecting. Defend the innocent, rescue the threatened, and consider your role as a hero in order to take your first steps in creating the legendary precursor Dawn.
2253.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

2254.name: Weed Whacker
2254.description: Story Mission: Torn from the Sky
2254.requirement: Defeat 30 Mordrem during the night attack.

2255.name: Fix-r-Upper
2255.requirement: Collect these items and skins to receive the scrapper's hammer, Fix-r-Upper.
2255.locked_text: Begin training the engineer's scrapper elite specialization.

2256.name: Prismatic Plunderer
2256.requirement: Pick up a wyvern crystal for the skritt.

2257.name: Pact Camper
2257.description: Establishing law and order wherever you go.

2258.name: Mistward Legguards
2258.requirement: Collect all items and skins to forge your Mistward Legguards.
2258.locked_text: Complete the Invocation revenant specialization to unlock the Mistward Legguards collection.

2259.name: Axemaster Hareth Slayer
2259.description: Another Mordrem commander cut down in his prime.
2259.requirement: Kill Axemaster Hareth during the fight against the Mouth of Mordremoth.

2260.name: Howler III: Howl
2260.description: Ghosts. Shades. Spirits of the Wild. They exist within our world and somewhere else as well, insubstantial, yet powerful. Meditate upon their nature in your journey to craft the legendary precursor known as Howl.

2261.name: Ogre Lane Defender
2261.requirement: Successfully participate in the Ogre lane for the entirety of the King of the Jungle battle.

2262.name: Auric Weapons
2262.requirement: Unlock all Auric weapon skins in your wardrobe.

2263.name: Egg Bearer
2263.description: Get to the top of the inner chamber in Tarir.

2264.name: Torn from the Sky
2264.description: Journal: Torn from the Sky Completed
2264.requirement: Complete the Torn from the Sky story mission.

2265.name: Dragon's Stand Overviewer
2265.description: You've found the safest view of Mordremoth's domain.
2265.requirement: Use advanced gliding to reach the farthest overlook of Mordremoth's domain.

2266.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 35
2266.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

2267.name: Auric Basin Insight: Eastwatch Bluff
2267.requirement: Discover Insights of Maguuma Mastery in Auric Basin.

2268.name: Astralaria IV: The Cosmos
2268.description: The heavens have aligned to support you in your quest! Chart their places within the heavens to discern their wisdom, and defeat the Elder Dragons and their spawn that threaten the world. Complete these tasks, and earn the Gift of the Cosmos, the penultimate step in attaining the legendary axe known as Astralaria.

2269.name: Central Tower Taker
2269.description: You sure showed that tower who was boss.
2269.requirement: Capture the Central Blighting Tower in Dragon's Stand.

2270.name: Howler I: The Experimental Warhorn
