2270.description: You hear their cries on the wind in the mountain valleys and the far places of the world. They are the wolves, fierce as individuals, and united as a pack. Consider their combined power as you channel the wolf's hunting spirit in your initial steps to attack the legendary precursor, Howl.
2270.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

2272.name: Adept Daredevil
2272.requirement: Begin training the thief's daredevil elite specialization.

2273.name: Vigil's Honor
2273.requirement: Unlock all Vigil's Honor weapon and armor skins.
2273.locked_text: Purchase a Vigil Equipment Guide from Vigil weapon and armor merchants at the Vigil Headquarters.

2274.name: Revenant: Invocation
2274.requirement: Complete the Invocation revenant specialization to unlock the Mistward Legguards collection.

2275.name: Enchanted Armor Wearer
2275.description: When you've got the glow, your body's gold!
2275.requirement: Use the Exalted device to enter enchanted armor in Dragon's Stand.

2276.name: Shooting Gallery: Gold
2276.requirement: Shoot as many target dummies as you can before time runs out!

2278.name: Sunrise II: The Perfected Daysword
2278.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor Dawn has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

2279.name: Gold Fractal Master
2279.description: <c=@flavor>WARNING: Some fractals may cause injury, psychic trauma, blindness, or death.</c>
2279.requirement: Unlock all gold fractal weapon skins in your wardrobe.

2280.name: The Predator III: The Hunter
2280.description: One hunts by stealth and slyness, and one targets only the most valuable prey. Show your ability to stalk your prey and use the knowledge gained as you craft the legendary precursor The Hunter.

2281.name: Ground Pounder
2281.requirement: Complete all 5 outposts in the Verdant Brink.

2282.name: Machined Staff
2282.requirement: Collect all items to forge your Machined Staff.

2283.name: The Golden Chicken
2283.description: If a gold chicken exists, where would it hide in a golden city?
2283.requirement: Find a gold chicken in Tarir.

2284.name: A Royal Tradition
2284.requirement: Complete a round of Mad King Says.

2285.name: Priory's History
2285.requirement: Unlock all Priory Historical weapon and armor skins.
2285.locked_text: Purchase a Priory Equipment Guide from Priory weapon and armor merchants at the Durmand Priory.

2286.name: Master Mushroom Spelunker
2286.requirement: Find your way to the treasure chest in the mushroom cave in Tangled Depths.

2287.name: Is A Good Offense
2287.requirement: Choose to go with Tizlak to attack the Mordrem Guard at their staging area before they can attack the Itzel village.

2288.name: Nevermore II: Ravenswood Staff
2288.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor The Raven Staff has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

2290.name: Machined Scepter
2290.requirement: Collect all items to forge your Machined Scepter.

2291.name: The Moot II: The Perfected Mace
2291.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor The Energizer has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

2292.name: Highest Gear
2292.description: Watch out for those ancient chess golems. They're known to cheat.

2293.name: Nuhoch Lane Defender
2293.requirement: Successfully participate in the Nuhoch lane for the entirety of the King of the Jungle battle.

2294.name: Tetrad Trouncer
2294.description: Four times the trouble; four times the fun.
2294.requirement: Defeat the Mordrem tetrad after nightfall in Verdant Brink.

2295.name: Legendary Backpack: Ad Infinitum
2295.description: Unlock all 13 fractal tier 4 components to work towards building the legendary fractal backpack.
2295.locked_text: Complete Ad Infinitum III, then talk to Kelvei in the Fractals of the Mists.

2296.name: Kraitkin III: Venom
2296.description: The krait are the monsters of the deep—vile, violent, and totally evil. Their slave-raiding parties roam the beaches, and their towers rise from the depths of the sea. Battle these malevolent masters of the ocean in your journey to craft the legendary precursor Venom.

2297.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 28
2297.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

2298.name: The Ley-Line Run: Silver
2298.requirement: Zap your way through the checkpoints and across the finish line!

2299.name: SCAR Supporter
2299.description: Great to have you lead the way, Commander!
2299.requirement: Participate in every stage of helping the SCAR team recover from the crash.

2300.name: Machined Greatsword
2300.requirement: Collect all items to forge your Machined Greatsword.

2301.name: Peer Review
2301.description: Story Instance: Prisoners of the Dragon
2301.requirement: Explore the mesas and follow the ornithologist's trail of clues to verify or disprove his hypothesis.

2302.name: Mistward Warboots
2302.requirement: Collect all items and skins to forge your Mistward Warboots.
2302.locked_text: Complete the Corruption revenant specialization to unlock the Mistward Warboots collection.

2303.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 22
2303.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

2304.name: Caught 'Em All
2304.description: You don't actually have to catch 'em all...
2304.requirement: Catch the goodies released from a floating crate in the sky.

2305.name: Tangled Depths Insight: Order of Whispers Outpost
2305.requirement: Discover this Maguuma Mastery Insight in Tangled Depths.

2306.name: Kamohoali'i Kotaki II: The Perfected Spear
2306.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor Carcharias has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

2308.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 16
2308.requirement: Complete scale 16 fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

2309.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 36
2309.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

2310.name: Rata Novus Lane Defender
2310.requirement: Successfully participate in the Rata Novus lane for the entirety of the King of the Jungle battle.

2311.name: Kudzu II: The Perfected Longbow
2311.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor Leaf of Kudzu has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

2312.name: Pumpkin Carving
2312.description: Made in the Mad King's own image.
2312.requirement: Find pumpkins all around Tyria and carve them.

2313.name: The Minstrel I: The Experimental Focus
2313.description: Which came first, the critic or the egg? It is hard to tell, but the former seems to be well armed with the latter. Comprehend the nature of these critical missiles in order to take your first steps in creating the legendary precursor The Bard.
2313.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

2314.name: Heart of Thorns Act I Mastery
2314.requirement: Complete all Heart of Thorns Act I achievements.

2315.name: The Jungle Provides
2315.requirement: Complete The Jungle Provides story mission.

2316.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 5
2316.requirement: Complete scale 5 fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

2317.name: Daily Revenant or Elementalist Winner
2317.requirement: Win PvP match as a revenant or elementalist.

2318.name: Casual-Fractal Hero
2318.requirement: Complete each fractal scale from 1 to 20.

2319.name: Pact Reformer
2319.requirement: Unlock the Warmaster's Pack, Lightbringer's Pack, and Magister's Pack skins in your wardrobe.

2320.name: Prized Possessions
2320.requirement: Complete the Prized Possessions story mission.

2321.name: Pulse Room Glider
2321.requirement: Fly to the place of power in the Ley-Line Confluence.

2323.name: Ogre Airship Climber
2323.requirement: Climb to the top of the crashed airship in the Ogre camp.

2324.name: Verdant Brink Insight: Canopy Over Pact Encampment
2324.requirement: Discover this Maguuma Mastery Insight in Verdant Brink.

2325.name: Machined Short Bow
2325.requirement: Collect all items to forge your Machined Short Bow.

2326.name: "Sword of Smodur" Strongbox
2326.requirement: Search in the Chak Stronghold area for the strongbox from the "Sword of Smodur."

2327.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 14
2327.requirement: Complete scale 14 fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

2328.name: Laser Lighter
2328.description: Who doesn't love a laser show?
2328.requirement: Help Splort activate Rata Novan lasers.

2329.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 7
2329.requirement: Complete scale 7 fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

2330.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 30
2330.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

2331.name: The Floor Is Lava?: Gold
2331.requirement: Kick rockvine fruit and retrieve as many spores as you can before time runs out!

2332.name: Machined Longbow
2332.requirement: Collect all items to forge your Machined Longbow.

2333.name: Froglicker
2333.requirement: Defeat Cotoni and Huetzi after nightfall.

2334.name: Drone Race: Gold
2334.requirement: Boost and blast your way through the checkpoints and across the finish line!

2335.name: Scrap Rifle Field Test: Gold
2335.requirement: Kill as many chak as you can before the timer runs out, but be careful—your scrap rifle is prone to overheating! Destroying chak eggs will release a goo that will heal you and cool your rifle if you are close by, but it's likely to stir up the chak.

2336.name: Nevermore III: The Raven Staff
2336.description: Tyria is both a physical and a spiritual place, and its hills and forests are alive with ghosts, spirits, and other ethereal creatures. Seek the spirit of the wild raven that haunts its hills and forests. Let it lead you on its path in your quest to attain the Raven Staff, the next step in your quest to attain Nevermore.

2337.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 48
2337.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

2339.name: Verdant Brink Insight: Fumerol Caves
2339.requirement: Discover this Maguuma Mastery Insight in Verdant Brink.

2341.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 38
2341.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

2342.name: Mushroom Power
2342.requirement: Participate in the assault on the western octovine during the Battle in Tarir.

2343.name: Dive Master: Verdant Brink
2343.requirement: Use the diving goggles found in the Pact fleet wreckage in Verdant Brink.

2344.name: Headhunter
2344.requirement: Defeat the Legendary Archdiviner at the top of the Cliffside fractal while only killing five cultists or chanters. This does not include the initial entourage. Must be completed on scale 21 or above.

2346.name: Great Heights
2346.requirement: Defeat the Anomaly without anyone falling off the platform inside the Thaumanova Reactor fractal.

2347.name: Mushroom Musterer
2347.description: You helped grow the skritt a mushroom army!
2347.requirement: Raise a mushroom army for the skritt.

2348.name: Wild Dragon Chase
2348.requirement: While being pursued by the Mordrem beast, find and retrieve all 23 Echoes of Glint.

2349.name: Tangled Depths Insight: Twisting Viaduct
2349.requirement: Discover this Maguuma Mastery Insight in Tangled Depths.

2350.name: Shooting Gallery: Silver
2350.requirement: Shoot as many target dummies as you can before time runs out!

2351.name: Ad Infinitum I: Finite Result
2351.description: Unlock all 11 fractal components to work towards building the legendary fractal backpack.
2351.locked_text: Talk to Kelvei in the Fractals of the Mists.

2352.name: Lord of the Jungle
2352.description: Loincloths will be all the rage next season...
2352.requirement: Heal or enhance Lord Faren to support his training.

2353.name: Master Scrapper
2353.requirement: Completely train the engineer's scrapper elite specialization.

2354.name: HOPE II: Development
2354.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor Prototype has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

2355.name: Bolt I: The Experimental Sword
2355.description: Tyria's finest sword wielders are pure artists, deftly weaving traditional attacks with inspirational lightning maneuvers to create a deadly dance of steel. Consider the art and artisanship of Tyria as you take the first steps in your crafting of the legendary precursor Zap.
2355.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

2356.name: Bolt II: The Perfected Sword
2356.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor Zap has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

2358.name: Bonebreaker
2358.requirement: Defeat the Labyrinthine Horror in Mad King's Labyrinth.

2359.name: Machined Mace
2359.requirement: Collect all items to forge your Machined Mace.

2360.name: Crusader's Pack
2360.requirement: Collect all items to create your Crusader's Pack.
2360.locked_text: On first completion of the story step "Prisoners of the Dragon," choose one of the three order-themed backpacks.

2361.name: Search and Rescue
2361.description: Story Mission: Torn from the Sky

2362.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 1
2362.requirement: Complete scale 1 fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

2363.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 32
2363.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

2364.name: Heart of Thorns Act III Mastery
2364.requirement: Complete all Heart of Thorns Act III achievements.

2365.name: "Cryptonym" Strongbox
2365.requirement: Search in the Undergrowth Connector area for the strongbox from the "Cryptonym."

2366.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 23
2366.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

2368.name: Ad Infinitum III: Unbound
2368.description: Unlock all 11 fractal tier 3 components to work towards building the legendary fractal backpack.
2368.locked_text: Complete Ad Infinitum II, then talk to Kelvei in the Fractals of the Mists.

2369.name: Father of Wyverns
2369.description: Just wait until their father gets home...
2369.requirement: Defeat the wyvern patriarch after nightfall in Verdant Brink.

2370.name: Auric Basin Explorer
2370.requirement: Explore all areas in Auric Basin.

2371.name: Chak Crusher
2371.requirement: Defeat the Chak Driver in Tangled Depths.

2373.name: A Study in Gold
2373.requirement: Speak to Sage Laural at Westgate to receive an auric viewer, then scan the tablets in the city for clues to Herta's location.

bits.text: Eastgate: Where the Falls End and Nature Begins
Eastgate: A Great View of a Mighty Tree
Westgate: The Way Has Decayed Unless You Fly
Southgate: You'll Only Be Able to Reach This from Very High Up
Luminate's Throne: The Jungle Grows Even Up Here
Northgate: Where We Lay Our Masks to Rest
Trial Rooms: Heavy Foliage Hides This One
Trial Rooms: Glint's Words Guide Us
Inner Chamber: One Day There Will Be Another

2374.name: The Moot III: The Energizer
2374.description: After the successful hunt comes the celebration, when all the pent-up energy of the battle is released in food and song. Drink, dine, dance, and revel across the land of Tyria in your journey to attain the legendary precursor known as the Energizer.

2375.name: Mistward Pauldrons
2375.requirement: Collect all items and skins to forge your Mistward Pauldrons.
2375.locked_text: Complete the Retribution revenant specialization to unlock the Mistward Pauldrons collection.

2376.name: Northern Tower Taker
2376.description: You sure showed that tower who was boss.
2376.requirement: Capture the Northern Blighting Tower in Dragon's Stand.

2377.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 37
2377.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

2378.name: Tangled Depths Explorer
2378.requirement: Explore all areas in Tangled Depths.

2379.name: Still Faster Than Light
2379.requirement: Complete Kleptotronic Advanced Designs without being hit by lasers.

2380.name: Tangled Depths Insight: Terraced Hive
2380.requirement: Discover this Maguuma Mastery Insight in Tangled Depths.

2382.name: Sanctum Scramble: Gold
2382.requirement: Jump, launch, and glide your way through the checkpoints and across the finish line!

2383.name: Kudzu III: Leaf of Kudzu
2383.description: Within sight of a great volcano lies a hidden garden that you must make your own. Tame and raise the plants within this hidden garden to master their secrets, channeling that power into your efforts to create the legendary precursor Leaf of Kudzu.

2384.name: Master Dragonhunter
2384.requirement: Completely train the guardian's dragonhunter elite specialization.

2385.name: Master Daredevil
2385.requirement: Completely train the thief's daredevil elite specialization.

2387.name: Wallowing Whiz
2387.description: Willing to wallow to get where you're going.
2387.requirement: Travel from Toadstool Mire to Exhumed Delve via Nuhoch Wallow.

2388.name: Rodgort III: Rodgort's Flame
2388.description: Fire provides both heat and light, inflicting burns against the foe and calling attention to itself through its bright, flickering nature. Use the flames for both weal and woe as you attain the legendary precursor Rodgort's Flame.

2389.name: Quip I: The Experimental Pistol
2389.description: Humor is in the mind of the beholder, and a prankster is welcome everywhere. Well, most places. Well, among your friends. Consider this quirk in the nature of the universe as you take your first steps in creating the legendary precursor the Chaos Gun.
2389.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

2390.name: The Flameseeker Prophecies II: The Perfected Shield
2390.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor The Chosen has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

2391.name: Meteorlogicus II: The Perfected Scepter
2391.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor Storm has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

2392.name: Sign Cutting
2392.requirement: Complete the Sign Cutting story mission.

2393.name: Frostfang III: Tooth of Frostfang
2393.description: Within the halls of the norn hang the Fang of the Serpent, a fragment of the great ice Elder Dragon. Frostfang was the greatest of Jormag's champions, and Asgeir Dragonrender slayed Frostfang with but a single blow. Channel this power over ice into your efforts to create the legendary precursor Tooth of Frostfang.

2395.name: Master Chronomancer
2395.requirement: Completely train the mesmer's chronomancer elite specialization.

2396.name: Tangled Depths Insight: Northern Confluence
2396.requirement: Discover this Maguuma Mastery Insight in Tangled Depths.

2397.name: Heart of Thorns Act IV Mastery
2397.requirement: Complete all Heart of Thorns Act IV achievements.

2398.name: Daily Revenant or Warrior Winner
2398.requirement: Win PvP match as a revenant or warrior.

2399.name: Champion Revered
2399.description: Sending my enemies to meet the legends.
2399.requirement: Win rated arena game as a revenant.

2400.name: Adept Chronomancer
2400.requirement: Begin training the mesmer's chronomancer elite specialization.

2401.name: Sum Viewer
2401.description: I can see my college from here!
2401.requirement: Catch a glimpse of Rata Sum in the distance.

2402.name: Seeker of Lost Homework
2402.description:
"Math? Of course I know math! What kind of things are they teaching you kids these days? Bah!"
—Councillor Phlunt
2402.requirement: Collect junk items from Fractal Encryptions awarded in the Fractals of the Mists.

2403.name: Untethered
2403.requirement: Avoid being struck by any vine whips while climbing the helix.

2404.name: Machined Dagger
2404.requirement: Collect all items to forge your Machined Dagger.

2405.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 4
2405.requirement: Complete scale 4 fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

2406.name: Fallen Masks: Gold
2406.requirement: Soothe the tormented spirits of fallen Exalted.

2407.name: Bladed Armor
2407.requirement: Unlock all Bladed armor skins in your wardrobe.

2408.name: Lessons in Agony
2408.requirement: Complete difficulty scale 20 in the Fractals of the Mists.

2409.name: Frenzy III: Rage
2409.description: Quaggans are a peaceful people, but when provoked, quaggans become engines of anger and fury. Usually, though, quaggans like friends. Quaggans want give them friendship bracelets. Will you be quaggans' friend? Consider your reply carefully as you seek to attain the legendary precursor Rage.

2411.name: Daily Fractal Champion
2411.requirement: Complete different scale 51–100 fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

2413.name: Mistward Plate
2413.requirement: Collect all items and skins to forge your Mistward Plate.
2413.locked_text: Complete the Salvation revenant specialization to unlock the Mistward Plate collection.

2414.name: Munition Re-Upper
2414.requirement: Gather Mordrem vine pods for Briallen to make explosives.

2415.name: Fractal Master
2415.requirement: Complete each fractal scale from 76 to 100.

2417.name: Droppin' Bombs
2417.description: You showed that ugly octovine who's boss when you dropped bombs all over it.
2417.requirement: Participate in the assault on the eastern octovine during the Battle in Tarir.

2418.name: The North Wind
2418.requirement: Collect these items and skins to receive the tempest's warhorn, North Wind.
2418.locked_text: Begin training the elementalist's tempest elite specialization.

2419.name: Migraine
2419.requirement: Complete the mission while Challenge Mode is active. (Challenge Mode is intended for parties of 5.)

2420.name: Twilight I: The Experimental Nightsword
2420.description: All things must end, all kingdoms must perish, and every day must finish in the fall of night. Consider the finality of all things by meditating on the transience of power and glory throughout Tyria, all in order to take your first steps in creating the legendary precursor known as Dusk.
2420.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

2421.name: Never Say Die
2421.requirement: Complete the trial of strength with no deaths.

2422.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 8
2422.requirement: Complete scale 8 fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

2423.name: Mother of Wyverns
2423.description: Those are her babies and grandbabies you've been killing...
2423.requirement: Defeat the wyvern matriarch after nightfall in Verdant Brink.

2424.name: Tendril Torchers: Silver
2424.requirement: Burn tendrils and avoid unexploded shot before time runs out!

2425.name: Ley Line Glider
2425.requirement: Glide along ley lines in Dragon's Stand.

2426.name: Scribe
2426.requirement: Reach rating in the scribing discipline.

2427.name: Powered Up
2427.requirement: Participate in powering up each of the outposts around Auric Basin.

2428.name: The Dreamer III: The Lover
2428.description: Desire leads to dreams, and the passions of the heart to the yearnings of the soul. Some dreams are bright, some are dark, some are for things lost, and some are for things yet to be. Gather these fragments of dreams and desires to channel into your efforts to create the legendary precursor known as The Lover.

2429.name: Diarmid Dropper
2429.description: Your machete may not be enough...

2432.name: Wild Abandon
2432.requirement: Collect these items and skins to receive the berserker's torch, Wild Abandon.
2432.locked_text: Begin training the warrior's berserker elite specialization.

2433.name: Astralaria III: The Mechanism
2433.description: The heavens grant their gifts to Tyria in the form of meteors that streak across our skies. Gather the ore of these fallen stars and use it to craft the spinning armillary that will eventually rest in the heart of your legendary weapon. Do this to create The Mechanism, the next step of your quest to attain Astralaria.

2434.name: BUY-2046 PFR's Challenge #103
2434.description: Once you've proven your fractal prowess, BUY-2046 PFR will sell you Fractal Gear Boxes containing your choice of fractal weapon skins.
2434.requirement: Complete difficulty scale 50 in the Fractals of the Mists.

2435.name: Bugs in the Branches: Silver
2435.requirement: Jump and glide to collect bugs before time runs out!

2436.name: Dive Master: Chak Hive
2436.requirement: Use the diving goggles near the SCAR outpost.

2437.name: "Whitebear's Pride II" Strongbox
2437.requirement: Search in the Northern Confluence Passage area for the strongbox from the "Whitebear's Pride II."

2438.name: The Juggernaut I: The Experimental Hammer
2438.description: The wonders of the stone and soil, carved by nature and by sentient races, exude both power and stability. Meditate on these great places in order to take your first steps in creating the legendary precursor known as The Colossus.
2438.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

2439.name: Shooting Star
2439.requirement: Use stealth gliding to reach the Mordrem Vineyard.

2440.name: Establishing a Foothold
2440.requirement: Complete the Establishing a Foothold story mission.

2441.name: Meteorlogicus I: The Experimental Scepter
2441.description: The power of the elements are some of the greatest powers in Tyria. Journey through the land and experience the fury of its storms and the might of its creatures as you begin your personal journey to create the legendary precursor Storm.
2441.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

2442.name: Luminate's Backplate
2442.requirement: Collect all items to forge the ascended backpack, Luminate's Backplate.

2443.name: Buried Insight
2443.requirement: Complete the Buried Insight story mission.

2444.name: Chak Killer—Master
2444.requirement: Jump into the pit and kill chak.

2445.name: On Wings of Gold: Gold
2445.requirement: Deliver collected shield anomalies by gliding near the collection device.

2446.name: "Plains of Golghein" Strongbox
2446.requirement: Search in the Ley Line Confluence area for the strongbox from the "Plains of Golghein."

2447.name: Astralaria II: The Apparatus
2447.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor The Mechanism has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

2448.name: Master Tempest
2448.requirement: Completely train the elementalist's Tempest elite specialization.

2449.name: Meteorlogicus III: Storm
2449.description: Power, regardless of origin, is only of use when it is properly mastered, and to control the elements, one must understand the nature of control itself. Consider the nature of control, those who control, and those who are controlled, in your quest to attain the legendary precursor Storm.

2450.name: HOPE I: Research
2450.description: The froglike hylek are Tyria's best alchemists, the masters of potion and poison. Take the role of the apprentice in discovering the secrets of their work to create research, the first step in attaining the Hylek Optimized Projectile Experiment (HOPE).
2450.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

2452.name: Ydalir
2452.requirement: Collect these items and skins to receive the dragonhunter's bow, Ydalir.
2452.locked_text: Begin training the guardian's dragonhunter elite specialization.

2453.name: Archeotech Adept
2453.description: You've learned how to repair the archaic technology in Rata Novus.
2453.requirement: Collect all of the parts needed to repair the ancient broken golem in Rata Novus.

2454.name: Machined Rifle
2454.requirement: Collect all items to forge your Machined Rifle.

2455.name: Master Herald
2455.requirement: Completely train the revenant's herald elite specialization.

2457.name: Tangled Depths Insight: Nuhoch Lane
2457.requirement: Discover this Maguuma Mastery Insight in Tangled Depths.

2458.name: Incinerator II: The Perfected Dagger
2458.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor Spark has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

2460.name: Bugs in the Branches: Gold
2460.requirement: Jump and glide to collect bugs before time runs out!

2461.name: Scholar's Pack
2461.requirement: Collect all items to create your Scholar's Pack.
2461.locked_text: On first completion of the story step "Prisoners of the Dragon," choose one of the three order-themed backpacks.

2462.name: The Longest Glide
2462.requirement: Glide from the Mordrem migration path in SCAR Field Operations all the way to Dragon's Passage.

2464.name: Daily Revenant or Guardian Winner
2464.requirement: Win PvP match as a revenant or guardian.

2466.name: Stick the Landing
2466.description: Story Instance: Prisoners of the Dragon
2466.requirement: When gliding down into the Mordrem prison camp, land within the marked target zone.

2468.name: The Juggernaut III: The Colossus
2468.description: The power of the earth is not only in its strength but in its fluid nature, moving slowly as stone should not move. Collect and bond with the oozes that live in the heart of the world to solve their mysteries and create the legendary precursor The Colossus.

2469.name: Dug In
2469.description: Story Mission: Torn from the Sky
2469.requirement: Help the soldiers build up their defenses.

2470.name: Revenant: Corruption
2470.requirement: Complete the Corruption revenant specialization to unlock the Mistward Warboots collection.

2471.name: Master Berserker
2471.requirement: Completely train the warrior's berserker elite specialization.

2472.name: Hearts and Minds
2472.requirement: Complete the Hearts and Minds story mission.

2473.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 25
2473.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

2474.name: Amber Wurmslayer
2474.requirement: Kill the amber head of the great jungle wurm in Bloodtide Coast.

2475.name: No Lasers!
2475.requirement: Defeat the Jade Maw without anyone in your party being hit by its beam attack.

2476.name: Dark Harvest
2476.requirement: Collect these items and skins to receive the reaper's greatsword, Dark Harvest.
2476.locked_text: Begin training the necromancer's reaper elite specialization.

2477.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 2
2477.requirement: Complete scale 2 fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

2478.name: Frostfang I: The Experimental Axe
2478.description: The power of Jormag and the other Elder Dragons seeped into the lands of Tyria during the long epochs while they slept. Upwellings of this power may be found throughout the land, for those who know where to look and how to capture it. Let finding this power be the first part of your journey to craft the legendary precursor Tooth of Frostfang.
2478.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

2479.name: The Flameseeker Prophecies I: The Experimental Shield
2479.description: Tyria is a land of heroes and villains locked in eternal struggle. Attain the "Anthology of Villains," and record the tales of the defeat of the most dastardly of their lot. Meditate upon the nature of villainy as you take the first steps in creating the legendary precursor known as The Chosen.
2479.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

2480.name: Bolt III: Zap
2480.description: Brilliance strikes like a bolt from the blue, and that electric shock of imagination applies to both wielding and crafting the mightiest of weapons. Gather the energies of Tyria to infuse them into a superior weapon in your journey to craft the legendary precursor Zap.

2481.name: The Dreamer I: The Experimental Short Bow
2481.description: The heart hunts on a lonely train, plagued by desire, sadness, and occasionally joy. It pervades Tyria and its people. Track down these moments of the heart throughout the land in your first steps to create the legendary precursor The Lover.
2481.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

2482.name: Shut the Doors
2482.requirement: Complete door event in Mad King's Labyrinth.

2483.name: Kraitkin I: The Experimental Trident
2483.description: Versatile, flexible, and strong; tentacles invoke a feeling of strangeness and otherworldliness. Meditate on the virtues of such tentacled beasts as wind riders and jellyfish as you take your first steps in attaining the legendary precursor Venom.
2483.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

2484.name: The Floor Is Lava?: Silver
2484.requirement: Kick rockvine fruit and retrieve as many spores as you can before time runs out!

2485.name: Adept Herald
2485.requirement: Begin training the revenant's herald elite specialization.

2486.name: Revenant: Devastation
2486.requirement: Complete the Devastation revenant specialization to unlock the Mistward Warfists collection.

2487.name: Adept Scrapper
2487.requirement: Begin training the engineer's scrapper elite specialization.

2488.name: Leave It to Me
2488.requirement: Complete the teamwork trial without reviving any Pact soldiers.

2489.name: Jungle Totem Hunter
2489.description: No, you don't have to carry them all the way back...
2489.requirement: Discover all the lost Itzel totems in Verdant Brink.

2490.name: Glittering Weapon Collection
2490.requirement: Unlock all Glittering weapon skins in your wardrobe.

2491.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 17
2491.requirement: Complete scale 17 fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

2492.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 19
2492.requirement: Complete scale 19 fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

2494.name: Salvage Pit: Silver
2494.requirement: Gather supplies and avoid tendrils before time runs out!

2495.name: Whisper's Secret
2495.requirement: Unlock all Whisper's Secret weapon and armor skins.
2495.locked_text: Purchase an Order of Whispers Equipment Guide from Order of Whispers weapon and armor merchants in the Chantry of Secrets.

2496.name: Mouth of Mordremoth Master
2496.requirement: Slay the Mouth of Mordremoth in Dragon's Stand in under 20 minutes.

2497.name: Chak Killer—Expert
2497.requirement: Jump into the pit and kill chak.

2498.name: Quip II: The Perfected Pistol
2498.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor Chaos Gun has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

2499.name: Salvage Pit: Gold
2499.requirement: Gather supplies and avoid tendrils before time runs out!

2500.name: The Bifrost II: The Perfected Staff
2500.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor The Legend has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

2501.name: Strange Observations
2501.requirement: Complete the Strange Observations story mission.

2502.name: Incinerator III: Spark
2502.description: Natural materials are the foundations of understanding, but creative alchemy requires creations unlike those found in the natural world. Gather these unnatural materials in your efforts to forge the legendary precursor Spark.

2503.name: The Predator II: The Perfected Rifle
2503.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor The Hunter has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

2504.name: Flawless Escape
2504.requirement: While being pursued by the Mordrem beast, avoid taking any hit.

2505.name: "Lethal Vantage" Strongbox
2505.requirement: Search in the Creeping Crevasse area for the strongbox from the "Lethal Vantage."

2508.name: Machined Warhorn
2508.requirement: Collect all items to forge your Machined Warhorn.

2509.name: Heart of Thorns Act II Mastery
2509.requirement: Complete all Heart of Thorns Act II achievements.

2510.name: Excellent Judge of Character
2510.requirement: Pardon an innocent sylvari held in the Pact encampment.

2511.name: Daily Fractal Veteran
2511.requirement: Complete different scale 21–50 fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

2512.name: "Obsidian Triumph" Strongbox
2512.requirement: Search in the Bristleback Chasm area for the strongbox from the "Obsidian Triumph."

2513.name: Chak Killer—Beginner
2513.requirement: Jump into the pit and kill chak.

2514.name: Adept Dragonhunter
2514.requirement: Begin training the guardian's dragonhunter elite specialization.

2515.name: "Legacy of Owl" Strongbox
2515.requirement: Search in the Chak Nest area for the strongbox from the "Legacy of Owl."

2516.name: Where Exalted Dare
2516.requirement: Go to the vinetooth den to find Herta.
2516.locked_text: Speak to Sage Laural at Westgate to receive an auric viewer, then scan the tablets in the city for clues to Herta's location.

2517.name: Auric Basin Insight: Luminate's Throne
2517.requirement: Discover Insights of Maguuma Mastery in Auric Basin.

2519.name: Stealth Bombers
2519.requirement: Use stealth to bomb the reinforced door without triggering any security turrets or contractors within the Underground Facility fractal.

2521.name: Air Superiority
2521.requirement: Dive from the top of the helix into the center and reach the bottom within 10 seconds.

2522.name: Kraitkin II: The Perfected Trident
2522.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor Venom has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

2523.name: SCAR Lane Defender
2523.requirement: Successfully participate in the SCAR lane for the entirety of the King of the Jungle battle.

2524.name: Quip III: Chaos Gun
2524.description: Confetti bombs. Sigils of Mischief. Laughter. Pies. These are the weapons of a master prankster, used to embarrass the mighty and the might-be alike. Master these malicious matters of mischief in your efforts to craft the legendary precursor known as the Chaos Gun.

2525.name: Predatory Prey
2525.requirement: Defeat all enemies in the teamwork trial.

2526.name: Beetle Feast: Silver
2526.requirement: Eat yellow mushrooms to score points and blue mushrooms to gain abilities that help you in your hunt. Beware of the poisonous mushrooms with green spores, and use your burrow ability to bypass closed gates!

2527.name: The Predator's Path
2527.requirement: Complete the The Predator's Path story mission.

2528.name: Nevermore I: Ravenswood Branch
2528.description: The bounty of Tyria's nature is immense but not without limit, and as such must be cultivated, encouraged, and most of all protected. Get in touch with nature of Tyria in your quest to create the Ravenswood Branch, the first of the precursors to the legendary staff, Nevermore.
2528.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

2529.name: Mistward Headwrap
2529.requirement: Unlock the rest of the Mistward armor set to earn your headwrap.

2530.name: The Bifrost I: The Experimental Staff
2530.description: The Jotun Star, fabled relic of the ancient mystical race, was said to call down a rainbow to the land. The stone, and its power, was broken long ago. Help bring it to rest as the first part of your journey to craft the legendary precursor The Legend.
2530.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

2531.name: Roots of Terror
2531.requirement: Complete the Roots of Terror story mission.

2532.name: Skritt Salvager
2532.requirement: Loot a skritt burglar's treasure chest.

2533.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 31
2533.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

2534.name: The Predator I: The Experimental Rifle
2534.description: The rifle, whether it fires bullets or magical rays, is one of the most complex common weapons of Tyria. Understand its wonders by researching the technology of such weapons as you take your first steps in the personal journey to create the legendary precursor known as The Hunter.
2534.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

2535.name: Kamohoali'i Kotaki III: Carcharias
2535.description: The sea is wide and mighty, and conceals both great dangers and wondrous prizes. Dive into it, explore its depths, and swim deep beneath its ever-shifting surface in your journey to create the legendary precursor known as Carcharias.

2536.name: The Flameseeker Prophecies III: The Chosen
2536.description: Tyria is a land of heroes and villains locked in eternal struggle. Attain the "Anthology of Heroes," and record the tales of the greatest of their number, both from the past and the heroes of today. Consider the true nature of heroism in your efforts to craft the legendary precursor known as The Chosen.

2537.name: Avoid Traps
2537.requirement: Find Taimi without stepping on any Mordrem traps.

2538.name: "Dragonrender" Strongbox
2538.requirement: Search in the Rooted Copse area for the strongbox from the "Dragonrender."

2540.name: Flying Circus: Gold
2540.requirement: Glide through the glowing rings and reach the finish line as fast as possible!

2541.name: Patron of the Nobility
2541.requirement: Complete the Noble Crash Site outpost.

2542.name: Ascended Recycling
2542.requirement: Collect and consume powerful items from salvaging ascended gear.

2543.name: Ongoing Defense
2543.requirement: Defend one of the completed Pact towers when it falls under attack.

2544.name: "Scorchrazor II" Strongbox
2544.requirement: Search in the Central Barbed Gate area for the strongbox from the "Scorchrazor II."

2545.name: Machined Focus
2545.requirement: Collect all items to forge your Machined Focus.

2546.name: Beetle Feast: Gold
2546.requirement: Eat yellow mushrooms to score points and blue mushrooms to gain abilities that help you in your hunt. Beware of the poisonous mushrooms with green spores, and use your burrow ability to bypass closed gates!

2547.name: Adept Tempest
2547.requirement: Begin training the elementalist's tempest elite specialization.

2549.name: Tarnished Traitor
2549.description: Find this lost Exalted below the city of Tarir.
2549.locked_text: Defeat the tarnished warrior below Tarir.

2550.name: Nevermore IV: The Raven Spirit
2550.description: Take upon yourself the responsibility of raising a raven from egg to chick to adult, while you work toward taming the wild raven spirit you have already caught. With the blessings of the Great Spirit, Raven, these two are destined to join together, earning you the Gift of the Raven Spirit, the penultimate step to attaining the legendary staff, Nevermore.

2551.name: Cleaning House
2551.requirement: Locate and destroy all of the active Rata Novan security mechanisms throughout the city.

2552.name: "Mellaggan's Valor" Strongbox
2552.requirement: Search in the Blighted Depths area for the strongbox from the "Mellaggan's Valor."

2553.name: Mouth of Mordremoth Slayer
2553.description: Concentrated ley energy is off today's menu.
2553.requirement: Slay the Mouth of Mordremoth in Dragon's Stand.

bits.text: Kill the enraged chak overlord lurking in the chak stronghold.
Slay the champion chak blitzer to complete the Nuhoch's beetle training.
Eliminate the gigantic chak lobber in the valley outside Teku Nuhoch.
Rescue Zildi's Assist-o-Matic from the chak lobber near Rata Novus.
Defend the SCAR camp from the shielded chak blitzer.
Outsmart the chak crown and disrupt the chak in the Ley-Line Confluence.
Defeat the extra goopy chak lobber in the hive near the SCAR lane.

2555.name: Ultimate Challenge Winner
2555.description: You won all the outpost challenges around Auric Basin.
2555.requirement: Place first in all the outpost challenges around Auric Basin.
2555.locked_text: Win all of the outpost challenges.

2556.name: HOPE III: Prototype
2556.description: As the hylek are masters of alchemy, so too are the asura the wizards of technomagical research. They understand the forces in play in their Eternal Alchemy and how to apply them to the greater world. Uncover their secrets in your work to attain Prototype, the next step in your legendary journey for attaining HOPE.

2557.name: Ad Infinitum II: Upper Bound
2557.description: Unlock all 11 fractal tier 2 components to work towards building the legendary fractal backpack.
2557.locked_text: Complete Ad Infinitum I, then talk to Kelvei in the Fractals of the Mists.

2558.name: Flying Circus: Silver
2558.requirement: Glide through the glowing rings and reach the finish line as fast as possible!

2560.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 10
2560.requirement: Complete scale 10 fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

2561.name: Daily Revenant or Engineer Winner
2561.requirement: Win PvP match as a revenant or engineer.

2563.name: Wartime Sommelier
2563.requirement: Find some wine in the wreckage and serve one of the nobles.

2564.name: Incinerator I: The Experimental Dagger
2564.description: From the heart of the furnace, the elements dance and caper at your command! Many rare and unusual elements are needed for your journey, and you must capture and comprehend them all in order to take your first steps in creating the legendary precursor Spark.
2564.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

2565.name: "Endurance" Strongbox
2565.requirement: Search in the Griffonfall area for the strongbox from the "Endurance."

2566.name: Sky Commander
2566.requirement: Defeat all nightfall bosses in Verdant Brink.

2567.name: Firestorm Extinguisher
2567.requirement: Defeat the Molten Firestorm before defeating the Molten Berserker in the first phase of the encounter, then defeat the upgraded Molten Berserker in the second phase of the encounter in the Molten Boss fractal.

2568.name: Forgotten City Arches
2568.description: Use your glider to experience the beauty of Tarir.
2568.requirement: Glide through / arches below the waterfall on the eastern side of Tarir.

bits.text: Glide below the highest set of arches.
Glide below the medium set of arches.
Glide below the lowest set of arches.

2569.name: Machined Axe
2569.requirement: Collect all items to forge your Machined Axe.

2570.name: The Most Dangerous Game
2570.requirement: Reach and complete the final stage of an Itzel hunting excursion.

2571.name: Astralaria I: The Device
2571.description: The saying goes—the history of Tyria is written in the stars, and indeed the tales of the past and hints of the future are inscribed in the heavens. Help Ogden Stonehealer in revealing and gathering ancient knowledge in your quest to create the Device, the first of the precursors to the legendary axe Astralaria.
2571.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

2572.name: Warmaster's Pack
2572.requirement: Collect all items to construct your Warmaster's Pack.

2573.name: Bronzer
2573.description: It won't turn your skin orange, unless you already are...
2573.requirement: Earn a bronze medal or better on all 5 adventures in Verdant Brink.

2574.name: Treetop Retriever
2574.requirement: Locate the 10 lost Priory corpses in the Tarnished Treetop of Auric Basin.

bits.text: A female asura researcher was last seen north of Wanderer's Waypoint.
Since he went to an upper ledge to examine the Exalted portal, the asura researcher hasn't been heard from.
Someone overheard the Zintl boasting about finding the remains of a female charr explorer.
Echoes of a male charr explorer fighting a large colony of vampire beasts filled the canopy the other night.
A human explorer bailed from the airship too early. She was lost near Capitzel Grounds.
Heading east, the explorer was cornered by a jaguar. The human never made it down from the canopy.
An injured norn historian held off the bonebreaker so others could escape. Her sacrifice won't be forgotten.
A lower ledge broke his fall, but then the norn explorer was surrounded by Tengu scouts.
A sylvari historian got trapped along the northern cliffside of Tarnished Treetop. She had little chance to survive.
An explorer tried to find his way south and down from the canopy. The sylvari only found a Coztic ambush.

2575.name: Southern Tower Taker
2575.description: You sure showed that tower who was boss.
2575.requirement: Capture the Southern Blighting Tower in Dragon's Stand.

2577.name: Bitter Harvest
2577.requirement: Complete the Bitter Harvest story mission.

2579.name: Lore Untangler
2579.description: Obscure knowledge is no problem for the likes of you!
2579.requirement: Answer questions from the ancient holographic professors in Rata Novus.

2581.name: The Way In
2581.requirement: Complete The Way In story mission.

2582.name: Machined Weapons
2582.requirement: Unlock all Machined weapon skins in your wardrobe.

2583.name: "Slice of Sky" Strongbox
2583.requirement: Search in the Lastgear Standing area for the strongbox from the "Slice of Sky."

2584.name: Uzolan's Mechanical Orchestra
2584.requirement: Collect all items to learn how to recreate Uzolan's Mechanical Orchestra for your guild hall.

2585.name: Mistward Warfists
2585.requirement: Collect all items and skins to forge your Mistward Warfists.
2585.locked_text: Complete the Devastation revenant specialization to unlock the Mistward Warfists collection.

2586.name: Improvised Weapon Collection
2586.requirement: Unlock all Improvised weapon skins in your wardrobe.

2587.name: Conservation of Resources
2587.description: Story Mission: Torn from the Sky
2587.requirement: Keep the turret operational during the night attack.

2588.name: Howler II: The Perfected Warhorn
2588.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor Howl has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

2589.name: New Horizons
2589.requirement: Follow the trail of clues left behind by Kalla and Poskk to access the hidden lab in Rata Novus.

2590.name: Fire Jumper
2590.description: You've reached the highest heights and found your flame.
2590.requirement: Use a jump mushroom to gather flamethrower supplies.

2591.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 39
2591.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

2592.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 34
2592.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

2593.name: Master Druid
2593.requirement: Completely train the ranger's druid elite specialization.

2594.name: Mordrem Begone
2594.description: Spray those Mordrem until they stop moving. Then spray some more.
2594.requirement: Participate in the assault on the northern octovine during the Battle in Tarir.

2595.name: Tamer of Wyverns
2595.requirement: Help Sear Spicepaw gather saurian meat to summon a wyvern near Broken Altar.

2596.name: Rodgort II: The Perfected Torch
2596.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor Rodgort's Flame has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

2597.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 12
2597.requirement: Complete scale 12 fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

2598.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 41
2598.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

2599.name: Egg Run
2599.description: Be quick, but be careful. Also, be quick!
2599.requirement: Deliver a wyvern egg to Utogi in less than 5 seconds.

2600.name: Mordremoth Usurper
2600.requirement: Usurp the Mordrem controllers' positions and use their power to kill Mordrem wolves.

2601.name: Prismatic Percher
2601.description: The higher we go, the further we can see.
2601.requirement: Use gliding to reach new heights in the Prismatic Postpile.

2602.name: No Mask Left Behind
2602.description: Collect the masks of fallen Exalted throughout Auric Basin.
2602.requirement: Locate and collect all of the Exalted masks left behind by vinetooths in Auric Basin.
2602.locked_text: Can you find all the Exalted masks throughout the basin?

bits.text: Northwatch Descent: Deep underground below the outpost.
Bristleback Chasm: Somewhere up high in Vinetooth's Den.
Eastwatch Bluff: Overlooking an Eastwatch pylon where an Exalted sage is pulled from his duties.
Griffonfall: Hidden at the bottom of a secret waterfall.
Chak Hollow: Overlooking a razed Nuhoch village.
Morwood Wilds: Behind the vine wall, but be aware that timing is everything!
Bristleback Chasm: Across the falls, stuck on a tree.
Eastwatch Bluff: Look behind the various waterfalls.
The Falls: Check every southern-side tree branch leading down to the falls.
The Falls: Somewhere behind the expansive wall of water.
Westwatch Patch: Within the upper walls of the golden ooze cavern.
Tarnished Treetop: Look on the southern-canopy tree branches for this mask.
Northwatch Descent: On a southwestern ledge with an amazing view of the outpost.
Maguuma Shallows: On an upper perch near where creatures grow big.
Burnisher Quarry: Within the waters at the top of the waterfall.
Mossheart Walk: Within a small cave opposite wyvern's pylon.
Chak Hollow: Located within a southern alcove with a good view to the entrance of Tangled Depths.
Morwood Wilds: In the sky overlooking one of the blighted saplings.
Balthazar's Rest: On a rock with a clear view of the temple door.
Southwatch Creep: Look behind the northwestern wall that faces the outpost itself.
Southwatch Creep: Look to the east by the top of the Tarir entrance.
Southwatch Creep: Check the top roots when heading east on your way to the crash site.
Tarnished Treetop: Keep an eye out on the lower canopy near fungi royalty.
Lastgear Standing: On the outskirts of the cave entrance.
Arrowhead Vale: Overlooking the northern entrance to Tarir.

2603.name: Lost Lab Locator
2603.description: Just the spot to set up shop.
2603.requirement: Find the secret Rata Novus laboratory.

2605.name: Bat Wrangler
2605.description: Is there anything you can't wrangle?
2605.requirement: Help the ogres in Dragon's Stand reclaim their lost pets.

2606.name: Frostfang II: The Perfected Axe
2606.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor Tooth of Frostfang has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

2607.name: A Fungus Among Us: Gold
2607.requirement: Bounce your way through the checkpoints and across the finish line!

2608.name: Auric Basin Insight: Burnisher Quarry
2608.requirement: Discover Insights of Maguuma Mastery in Auric Basin.

2609.name: Machined Sword
2609.requirement: Collect all items to forge your Machined Sword.

2610.name: The Dreamer II: The Perfected Short Bow
2610.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor The Lover has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

2611.name: Daily Revenant or Necromancer Winner
2611.requirement: Win PvP match as a revenant or necromancer.

2612.name: Auric Basin Insight: The Falls
2612.requirement: Discover Insights of Maguuma Mastery in Auric Basin.

2613.name: Honorary Ogre
2613.description: The ogres consider you one of their own. In this case, that's a compliment.
2613.requirement: Participate in every stage of the ogres' survival in Tangled Depths.

2614.name: Invisible King
2614.description: Use your mastery skill to spot invasive fungi.
2614.requirement: Find and hit / mushroom king hiding in the lower Tarnished Treetop.

2615.name: Potoni Masher
2615.requirement: Defeat Potoni the Massive in Tangled Depths.

2616.name: The Best Defense
2616.requirement: Choose to remain in the Itzel village to defend it against the Mordrem Guard with Ibli and Kaana Miatli.

2617.name: "Straight and Narrow" Strongbox
2617.requirement: Search in the Tarnished Treetop area for the strongbox from the "Straight and Narrow."

2618.name: Ba-Boom
2618.requirement: Participate in the assault on the southern octovine during the Battle in Tarir.

2620.name: Cobalt Wurmslayer
2620.requirement: Kill the cobalt head of the great jungle wurm in Bloodtide Coast.

2621.name: Glint's Bastion
2621.requirement: Collect these items and skins to receive the herald's shield, Glint's Bastion.
2621.locked_text: Begin training the revenant's herald elite specialization.

2622.name: Saving the City of Gold
2622.description: Help save the great city of Tarir by fending off invading Mordrem.
2622.requirement: Partake in 100 battles for Tarir, and save the city.

2623.name: Daily Revenant or Mesmer Winner
2623.requirement: Win PvP match as a revenant or mesmer.

2624.name: "Thunderbreaker" Strongbox
2624.requirement: Search in the Noble Ledges area for the strongbox from the "Thunderbreaker."

2625.name: Friend of the Frogs
2625.description: The Nuhoch will warble your legend forever!
2625.requirement: Participate in every stage of building Teku Nuhoch back up.

2626.name: Bo
2626.requirement: Collect these items and skins to receive the daredevil's staff, Bo.
2626.locked_text: Begin training the thief's daredevil elite specialization.

2627.name: City of Hope
2627.requirement: Complete the City of Hope story mission.

2628.name: Magister's Pack
2628.requirement: Collect all items to construct your Magister's Pack.

2629.name: Machined Hammer
2629.requirement: Collect all items to forge your Machined Hammer.

2630.name: Sunrise III: Dawn
2630.description: A shining light of a new day reveals all and banishes the darkness to the deeper haunts of Tyria. Use your crafted Illuminator to gather the light throughout the land in your journey to create the legendary precursor known as Dawn.

2631.name: "Faren's Flyer" Strongbox
2631.requirement: Search in the canopy over the Ordnance Corps area for the strongbox from "Faren's Flyer."

2632.name: Now That's a Fungus
2632.requirement: Locate the Mushroom King near the Itzel village and help the Itzel farmer defeat it so that they can bring the meat home for his soup recipe.

2633.name: Sanctum Scramble: Silver
2633.requirement: Jump, launch, and glide your way through the checkpoints and across the finish line!

2634.name: Tarir Challenge Winner
2634.description: Win one of the challenges during the Invasion of Tarir.
2634.requirement: Place first in / of the Tarir challenges.

2636.name: Grassy Troll
2636.description: Bolt actions speak louder than words!
2636.requirement: Land 100 damaging shots with a Pale Reaver sniper rifle.

2637.name: Frenzy I: The Experimental Harpoon Gun
2637.description: Fishing in Tyria is no pleasant day spent safely on the shore, waiting for a fish to take the bait. It is fought on the fish's home turf, a battle of fisherman against fish. And the fish fight back. Consider this as you take your first steps in crafting the legendary precursor Rage.
2637.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

2638.name: Adept Druid
2638.requirement: Begin training the ranger's druid elite specialization.

2639.name: My Friends, the Smiths
2639.description: Story Instance: Prisoners of the Dragon
2639.requirement: While traveling to the Mordrem prison camp, find and rescue the five ordnance masters from the Pact: Baroosh, Shashoo, Beigarth, Izu, and Occam.

2640.name: Daily Revenant or Thief Winner
2640.requirement: Win PvP match as a revenant or thief.

2641.name: Machined Pistol
2641.requirement: Collect all items to forge your Machined Pistol.

2642.name: Kamohoali'i Kotaki I: The Experimental Spear
2642.description: They move through the sea, silent and remorseless. They are respected and feared for their unrelenting savagery. They are sharks. Consider the place of these great beasts in the world, for good and ill, as you take your first steps in creating the legendary precursor known as Carcharias.
2642.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

2643.name: Lightbringer's Pack
2643.requirement: Collect all items to construct your Lightbringer's Pack.

2644.name: Revenant: Retribution
2644.requirement: Complete the Retribution revenant specialization to unlock the Mistward Pauldrons collection.

2645.name: Master Reaper
2645.requirement: Completely train the necromancer's reaper elite specialization.

2646.name: Envoy Armor I: Experimental Armor
2646.description: The envoys shepherd the souls of the dead to their place in the Underworld. By studying spiritual energy, you may learn their secrets and start your journey toward building a truly legendary set of armor.
2646.locked_text: Defeat a boss in the Forsaken Thicket.

2648.name: Spectral Anomaly
2648.requirement: Avoid the Spectral Darkness, and defeat Gorseval.

2649.name: Denied
2649.requirement: Deny Gorseval from consuming any spirits during your victorious battle.

2650.name: Plasma Weapon Collection
2650.requirement: Unlock all Plasma weapon skins in your wardrobe.

bits.text: You'll miss it the first time.
If you can't stand the heat...

2652.name: Last Cannon
2652.requirement: Leave one cannon operational for the entire fight, and then defeat Sabetha.

2653.name: Undefeated

2765.name: Festive Imbiber
2765.description: All of these holiday drinks can cause a headache!
2765.requirement: Drink Wintersday drinks. These include spiced cider, buttered spirits, and eggnog.

2767.name: Honorary Krewe Member
2767.description: You must be this smart to enter.
2767.requirement: Defeat Toxx in Tixx's workshop in Divinity's Reach.

2768.name: Winter's Presence
2768.requirement: Collect all items to create Winter's Presence.
2768.locked_text: Purchase a blueprint for Winter's Presence from a Wintersday vendor.

2769.name: Toy Quality Control
2769.description: This can be described as one of those "fight fire with marshmallows" situations.
2769.requirement: Finish round of Toypocalypse during Wintersday.

2770.name: Donation Defender
2770.requirement: Successfully escort Ho-Ho-Tron's dolyak to the gate in Divinity's Reach.

2771.name: Dolyak Defender
2771.description: This dolyak WILL make it to deliver the presents today.
2771.requirement: Survive Toypocalypse with at least one living gift dolyak.

2772.name: Snowball Fight!
2772.requirement: Claim victory in the Snowball Mayhem activity 3 times during Wintersday.

2773.name: Wrapping Everywhere
2773.description: Only one way to find out what's inside.

2776.name: The Wintersday Gauntlet
2776.requirement: Complete the Winter Wonderland jumping puzzle time during Wintersday.

2777.name: Frozen Claw
2777.description: Even dragon lieutenants get cranky around the holidays.
2777.requirement: Defeat the Claw of Jormag times during Wintersday.

2778.name: Disassembly
2778.description: Don't they ever test this stuff?
2778.requirement: Defeat misbehaving Wintersday toys while helping Tixx run the workshop or exploring Tyria.

2779.name: Silver for the Season
2779.requirement: Donate silver to Ho-Ho-Tron in Divinity's Reach.

2780.name: Seasoned Toymaker
2780.description: Getting into the spirit of the season.
2780.requirement: Show your seasonal spirit by completing these achievements.

2781.name: Ringing the Right Notes
2781.requirement: Play the correct notes in Bell Choir Ensemble.

2782.name: Sounds of the Season
2782.description: Getting the right notes is harder than expected.
2782.requirement: Complete songs in the Bell Choir time during Wintersday.

2783.name: Wintersday Wrecking Ball
2783.description: Nothing a little tape and some glue can't fix.
2783.requirement: Destroy every miniature piece of Tixx's toy diorama in Tixx's Infinirarium. (Dungeon instance only; not in the Toypocalypse activity.)

2784.name: Golden Generosity
2784.requirement: Donate gold to Ho-Ho-Tron in Divinity's Reach.

2789.name: Donation Drive
2789.description: Doesn't it feel good to give? Even if not, at least it's for a good cause.
2789.requirement: Get wrapped gifts from the Wintersday vendor and give them to orphans around Divinity's Reach daily for a karma and experience boost.

2790.name: Snowball Mayhem Participant
2790.description: Your hands must be freezing by now.

2792.name: Connoisseur of Confection
2792.description: Be careful about eating too much at once; those sugar crashes can be painful.

2793.name: The Bells of Wintersday
2793.requirement: Complete songs in Bell Choir Ensemble.

2794.name: Finders Keepers
2794.description: Your greed ruined someone else's Wintersday. Jerk.
2794.requirement: Pick up a dropped present while escorting a donation dolyak in Divinity's Reach.

2795.name: Light Up the Sky
2795.requirement: Set off Lunar New Year fireworks.

2796.name: Branded Bane
2796.description: Crystallized corpses as far as the eye can see!
2796.requirement: Kill Branded during the Shatterer battle.

2797.name: Medic!
2797.description: The only time it's wise to run toward the sound of mortars.
2797.requirement: Provide med kits to your allies using the mortars or the glider bomber kit.

2798.name: Shattering Setup
2798.requirement: Use the mortar, turret, and jump pad at Lowland Burns during the Shatterer fight.

2799.name: Crystal Healing Denier
2799.description: Healing crystals? Sounds like a scam...
2799.requirement: Destroy pulsating crystal node during the Shatterer battle.

2800.name: Dragon's Heart
2800.requirement: Gain health while in the Dragon Ball arena.

2801.name: Burns Blunder
2801.requirement: Stand in the wrong place when the Shatterer Lands.

2803.name: No-Fly Zone
2803.description: Get down here; we're not done with you!
2803.requirement: Break the Shatterer's defiance bar time, preventing its Shard Storm attack.

2804.name: Dragon Ball Champion
2804.description: Count yourself among the elite of the Dragon Ball.

2805.name: Dragon's Breath
2805.requirement: Gain Dragon Damage power-up in the Dragon Ball arena.

2806.name: Firecracker Finder
2806.requirement: Find and light all of the firecrackers in the Crown Pavilion.

2807.name: Shattering Evasion
2807.requirement: Defeat the Shatterer without ever being imprisoned in a crystal.

2808.name: Smash the Dragon
2808.requirement: Complete the fight without the Shatterer ever taking off and using Shard Storm.

2809.name: Dragon's Gaze
2809.requirement: Interrupt skill in the Dragon Ball arena.

2810.name: Lightning Reflexes
2810.requirement: Dodge the Shatterer's Focused Lightning Attack time while gliding.

2811.name: Eldvin Monastery Brew of the Month Club
2811.description: Each month, Eldvin Monastery sends out a finely crafted beer to members of the Brew of the Month Club. Each beer's availability is limited to that particular month. After a new months begins, visit a major city to receive your package from Eldvin Monastery.
2811.locked_text: Purchase a membership from Master Brewer Desch at the Eldvin Monastery in Queensdale.

2813.name: Crystal Clear
2813.description: Break them before they break you!
2813.requirement: Break people out of crystal prisons created by the Shatterer.

2814.name: Dragon's Shadow
2814.requirement: Gain invisibility power-up in the Dragon Ball arena.

2815.name: Soaring Weapon Collection
2815.requirement: Unlock all Soaring weapon skins in your wardrobe.

2816.name: Daily PvP Matches Played in Unranked or Ranked Arena
2816.description: Win or lose, you see it through to the end.

2817.name: Daily Top Stats
2817.description: There's more than one way to contribute. You find the one that works.
2817.requirement: Earn a top scoreboard stat on your team in a PvP match.

2818.name: Exalted Legend
2818.requirement: Cross into the legendary division during the current PvP season.

2821.name: Seimur Was Wrong
2821.requirement: Complete the final encounter while your entire party is under the effects of tasty Bloodstone Bisque.

2823.name: Salvation Pass Sadist
2823.description: I think I hate all ten of us.
2823.requirement: Complete each of the encounter-enhancing achievements in Salvation Pass.

2824.name: Salvation Pass Mastery
2824.requirement: Channel the Maguuma Mastery Insight to earn a Mastery point.

2826.name: The Big Sleep
2826.requirement: Defeat the cave monster and release the magic that corrupted it.

2830.name: The Shield
2830.requirement: Liberate the Salvation Pass prison camp with zero civilian casualties.

2831.name: Environmentally Friendly
2831.requirement: Complete the prison camp encounter without using the environment to your advantage.

2832.name: Scattered Memories
2832.requirement: Find scattered journal pages to learn more about the brigands.

bits.text: Near where the ruined path begins.

3494.name: Playing for Keeps
3494.requirement: Bounce a single globolla marble on your head eight times in a row.

3495.name: Siren's Landing Master
3495.requirement: Collect all items to prove your mastery over Siren's Landing.
3495.locked_text: Acquire a Sentient Seed by combining the four sentient creations from Season 3. Misplaced items can be obtained from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

3497.name: Cleaning Up the Mess
3497.requirement: Kill the White Mantle reinforcements after preventing them from being called.

3499.name: Bitterfrost Frontier Master
3499.requirement: Collect all items to prove your mastery over Bitterfrost Frontier.
3499.locked_text: Acquire a Sentient Seed by combining the four sentient creations from Season 3. Misplaced items can be obtained from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

3500.locked_text: Acquire a Sentient Seed by combining the four sentient creations from Season 3. Misplaced items can be obtained from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

3501.name: Bloodtide Coast Insight: Bloody Bill's Base
3501.requirement: Discover this Mastery Insight in Bloodtide Coast.

3502.name: Battle Orr
3502.requirement: Stop the unchained giant from killing the oakheart.

3503.name: Not on My Watch
3503.requirement: Kill the White Mantle guarding the second crystal shard without letting them call reinforcements.

3504.name: Timberline Falls Insight: Copperhammer Mines

3505.name: Live Wire

3506.name: Siren's Landing Insight: Cliff's Edge
3506.requirement: Discover this Mastery Insight in Siren's Landing.

3508.requirement: Discover this Mastery Insight in Siren's Landing.

3509.requirement: Complete Shattered Observatory at fractal scale 1 or higher.

3510.name: Fearful
3510.requirement: Defeat the Manifestation of Self-Doubt in the Shining Blade headquarters by using Minor Breakthrough for help.

3513.name: Shattered Observatory Fractal
3513.description: Stitch the tears in the fabric of reality.
3513.requirement: Complete all the achievements associated with the Shattered Observatory fractal.

3514.name: Daily Siren's Landing: Gambler
3514.description: A chest a day keeps your gold at bay.
3514.requirement: Open one of the chests located within the Mouth of Abaddon.

3515.name: With Friends Like These...
3515.requirement: Activate all the runes around the exemplar while she's trapped in the White Mantle hideout.

3517.name: Two Sides, Same Coin
3517.description: You can have it both ways.
3517.requirement: Complete both Fearless and Fearful achievements.

3518.name: Storyteller: Balthazar
3518.requirement: Find all the pages of the Parable of Balthazar.

3519.name: Student of Bartholos
3519.requirement: Find all the sections of Bartholos's seminal work.

3520.name: Storyteller: Abaddon
3520.requirement: Find all the pages of the Parable of Abaddon.

3521.name: Echolocation
3521.requirement: Fly through the wyvern's ring attack without getting hit.

3522.name: Aurora: Awakening
3522.requirement: Collect all items to prove your mastery over Living World Season 3.
3522.locked_text: Acquire a Sentient Seed by combining the four sentient creations from Season 3. Misplaced items can be obtained from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

3524.name: Dodger Danger
3524.requirement: Succeed without taking damage from lightning.

3525.name: Relic Collector
3525.requirement: Unlock all god relics from Siren's Landing in your wardrobe.

3526.name: Iron Marches Insight: Sunken Halls of Clarent
3526.requirement: Discover this Mastery Insight in Iron Marches.

3527.name: Storyteller: Grenth
3527.requirement: Find all the pages of the Parable of Grenth.

3528.name: Closing the Loop
3528.requirement: Complete the Shattered Observatory fractal on the master tier.

3529.name: Ember Bay Master
3529.requirement: Collect all items to prove your mastery over Ember Bay.
3529.locked_text: Acquire a Sentient Seed by combining the four sentient creations from Season 3. Misplaced items can be obtained from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

3530.requirement: Discover this Mastery Insight in Fireheart Rise.

3531.name: Mount Maelstrom Insight: Volcanic Rim
3531.requirement: Discover this Mastery Insight in Mount Maelstrom.

3533.name: Block the Shock
3533.requirement: Kill Justiciar Araya without letting her summon any unstable elementals.

3534.name: Dredgehaunt Cliffs Insight: Dostoev Sky Peak
3534.requirement: Discover this Mastery Insight in Dredgehaunt Cliffs.

3535.name: Be Dynamic
3535.description: A full party of five must participate in the fractal from start to finish without dying.
3535.requirement: Accept the harbinger's challenge and complete the Shattered Observatory fractal with no one in your group being defeated.

3536.name: Storyteller: Lyssa
3536.requirement: Find all the pages of the Parable of Lyssa.

3537.name: Art Critic
3537.description: "I may not know art, but I know what I dislike."
3537.requirement: Destroy all statues in the hideout.

3539.name: Harathi Hinterlands Insight: Hidden Ourobon
3539.requirement: Discover this Mastery Insight in Harathi Hinterlands.

3540.name: In Bloom
3540.description: Look in the face of death...
