3542.name: Storyteller: Dwayna
3542.requirement: Find all the pages of the Parable of Dwayna.

3543.name: Sparkfly Fen Insight: Shattercleft Hills
3543.requirement: Discover this Mastery Insight in Mount Maelstrom.

3544.name: Abaddon's Weapon Collection
3544.requirement: Unlock all Abaddon's weapon skins in your wardrobe.

3546.name: The Withered Rose
3546.description: It's all that's left to remember her by.
3546.requirement: Bring the journal back to Dahlia.

3547.name: Draconis Mons Master
3547.requirement: Collect all items to prove your mastery over Draconis Mons.
3547.locked_text: Acquire a Sentient Seed by combining the four sentient creations from Season 3. Misplaced items can be obtained from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

3551.name: Lost Pilgrims
3551.requirement: Speak to the ritual priests Hehmnut, Kahdat, and Nahtem at their gravesites. The priests will only appear in response to a Vision Crystal.

3561.name: Race to the Finish: Crystal Oasis
3561.requirement: Finish the race around the Free City of Amnoon in first, second, or third place.

3575.name: Justice of the Blade
3575.requirement: Complete each task to aid the Shining Blade's investigation into bandit activity.

3586.name: Hammer and Tongs
3586.requirement: Survive your encounter with the Herald of Balthazar without succumbing to her Herald's Doom attack.

3625.name: Lost Lore of Crystal Oasis
3625.requirement: Collect the fragments of the book "Garden of the Gods."

3635.name: Dress Rehearsal
3635.description: <c=@Flavor>The rich fabrics and detailed patterns found throughout the Crystal Desert speak to the mix of cultures and nations that have called this land their home. </c>
3635.requirement: Recover all Elonian armor pieces through completing the Personal Story.

3644.name: A Trip Down Memory Lane
3644.description: Just like old times! But without the hydras...
3644.requirement: Win the memory game hosted by a lonely ghost.

3655.name: Crystal Oasis Insight: Amnoon Bazaar
3655.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in Crystal Oasis.

3710.name: Crystal Oasis Insight: Imed's Grotto
3710.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in Crystal Oasis.

3712.name: Conservation of Magic
3712.requirement: Complete each task to stay on top of the overflow of magic.

3744.name: Just a Sip
3744.requirement: Convince Master Chef Laraib in Amnoon that you are a worthy sous-chef.

3751.name: Fireproof Heart
3751.requirement: Rescue the people of Seeker's Village without taking burning damage.

3763.name: Crystal Oasis Insight: Old Amnoon
3763.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in Crystal Oasis.

3764.name: Crystal Oasis Legendary Bounties
3764.requirement: Defeat each legendary bounty in Crystal Oasis at least once.

3773.name: Crystal Oasis Bounty Tour
3773.requirement: Complete a bounty from each bounty board location.

3786.name: Renowned Adventurer: Crystal Oasis
3786.requirement: Complete all of the task regions in Crystal Oasis.

bits.text: Give aid to the refugees at Marifa Camp.
Use a raptor to save Seeker's Village.
Aid the villagers of Zephyr's Trace.

3802.name: Tip of the Spear
3802.description: <c=@Flavor>In addition to being a cultured and educated populace, the peoples of Elona are notably adept in ways of combat. </c>
3802.requirement: Recover all Elonian weapons by completing events, looting chests, and identifying items in renown regions of the Crystal Desert.

3805.name: Crystal Oasis Insight: Sifuri Quicksand
3805.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in Crystal Oasis.

3806.name: Dune Rider
3806.requirement: Unlock the raptor mount by completing the Seeker's Village task region in Crystal Oasis, and by purchasing a raptor saddle from Aksim.

3816.name: Sparking the Flame
3816.requirement: Complete the Sparking the Flame mission.

3844.name: Maintaining Order
3844.requirement: Speak with Shining Blade Officer Ralan about bandit activity in Kryta.

3850.name: Crystal Oasis Champion Bounties
3850.requirement: Defeat each champion bounty in Crystal Oasis at least once.

3862.name: Bleached Bones
3862.requirement: Discover bleached bones throughout Crystal Oasis.

3863.name: Ley of the Land
3863.requirement: Speak with Ela Makkay about surging magical energy.

3864.name: Crystal Oasis Explorer
3864.description: You've explored the lush croplands and drifting sands of Crystal Oasis.
3864.requirement: Explore all areas of Crystal Oasis.

3895.name: Tip of the Spear
3895.description: <c=@Flavor>In addition to being a cultured and educated populace, the peoples of Elona are notably adept in ways of combat. </c>
3895.requirement: Recover all Elonian weapons by completing events, looting chests, and identifying items in renown regions of the Crystal Desert.
